            class AiAnalysisChannel < ApplicationCable::Channel
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              def subscribed
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                if current_shop
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                  stream_from "ai_analysis_#{current_shop.id}"
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                else
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  reject
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                end
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              end
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              def unsubscribed
          
      11.

                  self.current_shop = find_verified_shop

                def find_verified_shop
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  # Find the shop based on the session or cookie
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  if (session_id = cookies.encrypted[:shopify_session_id])
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    Shop.find_by(shopify_domain: ShopifyApp::SessionRepository.retrieve_shop_session_by_id(session_id)&.domain)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  else
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    reject_unauthorized_connection

                  reject_unauthorized_connection

                def job_status_color(status)

                  case status
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  when "completed" then "bg-success"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  when "failed" then "bg-danger"
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29.

    30.

      31.

      32.

      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33.

              def calculate_inventory_health
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                products = @shop.kuralis_products.active
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                {
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  low_stock_count: products.where("base_quantity > 0 AND base_quantity <= ?", 5).count,
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  out_of_stock_count: products.where(base_quantity: 0).count,
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  price_inconsistencies_count: calculate_price_inconsistencies,
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  total_products: products.count
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                }
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              def calculate_price_inconsistencies
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                inconsistencies = 0
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                @shop.kuralis_products.includes(:shopify_product, :ebay_listing).each do |product|
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  base_price = product.base_price
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  # Check Shopify price inconsistency
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  if product.shopify_product&.price && (product.shopify_product.price - base_price).abs > 0.01
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    inconsistencies += 1
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    next
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  # Check eBay price inconsistency
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  if product.ebay_listing&.sale_price && (product.ebay_listing.sale_price - base_price).abs > 0.01
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    inconsistencies += 1
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                inconsistencies
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

              end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

            
          
      55.

              def gather_recent_activity

                # Recent product additions (last 3)

                # Recent job completions (last 2)

                  activities << {

                # Sort by timestamp and take the most recent 8

                activities.sort_by { |a| a[:timestamp] }.reverse.first(8)

      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97.

              def format_job_title(job_class)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                case job_class
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                when /Sync.*Orders/
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  "Orders Sync Completed"
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                when /Sync.*Products/
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  "Products Sync Completed"
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                when /Inventory/
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  "Inventory Sync Completed"
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                else
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  "System Task Completed"
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

              end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

              def calculate_inventory_trends
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                # Get data for the last 7 days
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                dates = (6.days.ago.to_date..Date.current).to_a
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                shopify_data = []
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                ebay_data = []
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                dates.each do |date|
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  # For now, we'll calculate current inventory levels
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  # In the future, you might want to store daily snapshots
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  shopify_inventory = @shop.shopify_products.sum(:quantity) || 0
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  ebay_inventory = @shop.shopify_ebay_account&.ebay_listings&.sum(:quantity) || 0
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  # Add some variation based on date to show trends
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  # This is a placeholder - replace with actual historical data when available
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  date_factor = (Date.current - date).to_i
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  shopify_data << [ shopify_inventory - (date_factor * 2), 0 ].max
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  ebay_data << [ ebay_inventory - (date_factor * 1), 0 ].max
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                {
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  labels: dates.map { |d| d.strftime("%b %d") },
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  shopify_data: shopify_data,
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  ebay_data: ebay_data
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                }
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

              end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

            end
          
      138.

                def callback

                  service = EbayOauthService.new

    27.

      54.

                end

              class ListingsController < Ebay::BaseController
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                def index
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                  @shop = current_shop
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                  base_query = @shop.shopify_ebay_account.ebay_listings
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  # Handle search query
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  if params[:query].present?
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                    search_term = "%#{params[:query]}%"
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                    case params[:search_by]
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                    when "title"
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                      base_query = base_query.where("title ILIKE ?", search_term)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    when "ebay_item_id"
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                      base_query = base_query.where("ebay_item_id ILIKE ?", search_term)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    when "sku"
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                      base_query = base_query.where("sku ILIKE ?", search_term)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    else # "all" or any other value
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                      base_query = base_query.where("title ILIKE ? OR ebay_item_id ILIKE ? OR sku ILIKE ?",
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                                                search_term, search_term, search_term)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  # Handle status filter
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  if params[:status].present?
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    case params[:status]
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    when "active"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                      base_query = base_query.where(ebay_status: "active")
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    when "ended"
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                      base_query = base_query.where.not(ebay_status: "active")
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    when "migrated"
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                      base_query = base_query.joins("INNER JOIN kuralis_products ON kuralis_products.id = ebay_listings.kuralis_product_id")
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    when "not_migrated"
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                      base_query = base_query.where(kuralis_product_id: nil)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  # Apply ordering and pagination
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  @listings = base_query.order(created_at: :desc)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                                        .page(params[:page])
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                                        .per(25) # Adjust number per page as needed
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                def end_listing
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  @listing = current_shop.shopify_ebay_account.ebay_listings.find(params[:id])
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  if @listing
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    Ebay::EndListingJob.perform_later(current_shop.id, @listing.id, params[:reason] || "NotAvailable")
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    respond_to do |format|
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                      format.html do
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                        flash[:notice] = "eBay listing will be ended. This may take a moment."
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                        redirect_to ebay_listings_path
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                      end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                      format.turbo_stream do
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                        flash.now[:notice] = "eBay listing will be ended. This may take a moment."
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                      end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                      format.json { render json: { message: "Ending listing" }, status: :ok }
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  else
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    respond_to do |format|
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                      format.html do
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                        flash[:alert] = "Listing not found."
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                        redirect_to ebay_listings_path
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                      format.turbo_stream do
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                        flash.now[:alert] = "Listing not found."
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                      end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                      format.json { render json: { error: "Listing not found" }, status: :not_found }
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    end
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                end
          
      73.

              end

            end

    app/controllers/ebay/migrations_controller.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    1. 
            

            

            module Ebay
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              class MigrationsController < Ebay::BaseController
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                def create
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                  listing_ids = if params[:migrate_all] == "true"
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                    # Get all unmigrated listing IDs from the database
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                    current_shop.shopify_ebay_account
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                               .ebay_listings
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                               .left_joins(:kuralis_product)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                               .where(kuralis_products: { id: nil })
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                               .pluck(:id)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  elsif params[:migrate_active] == "true"
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                    current_shop.shopify_ebay_account
          
      13.

                               .ebay_listings

                  if listing_ids.present?

              class NotificationsController < ApplicationController

                skip_before_action :verify_authenticity_token
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                def create
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  # Log the raw request for debugging
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "eBay Notification Received"
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Headers: #{request.headers.to_h.select { |k, _| k.start_with?('HTTP_') }}"
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Body: #{request.raw_post}"
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  # Parse the XML notification
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  notification = Hash.from_xml(request.raw_post)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Parsed Notification: #{notification.inspect}"
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  # Acknowledge receipt
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  head :ok
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error processing eBay notification: #{e.message}"
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  head :internal_server_error
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            end

                class QuickSyncController < Ebay::BaseController
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                    def create
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                        last_run = JobRun.where(job_class: 'ImportEbayListingsJob', 
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                                               shop_id: current_shop.id, 
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                                               status: 'completed')
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                                        .order(completed_at: :desc)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                                        .first
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                                        
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                        if last_run
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                          # Use the start time of the last successful run
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                          ImportEbayListingsJob.perform_later(current_shop.id, last_run.started_at)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                          message = 'Quick syncing eBay listings since last successful sync.'
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                        else
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                          # No previous successful run, do a full sync
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                          ImportEbayListingsJob.perform_later(current_shop.id)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                          message = 'No previous sync found. Running a full sync of eBay listings.'
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                        end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                        
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                        respond_to do |format|
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                          format.html do
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                            flash[:notice] = message
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                            redirect_to ebay_listings_path
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                          end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                          format.turbo_stream do
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                            flash.now[:notice] = message
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                          end
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                        end
          
      29.

                    end
          
      30.

                end

    app/controllers/home_controller.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    21 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 21 lines missed.

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            class HomeController < ApplicationController
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              include ShopifyApp::EmbeddedApp
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              include ShopifyApp::EnsureInstalled
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              include ShopifyApp::ShopAccessScopesVerification
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              def index
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @shop_origin = current_shopify_domain
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                @host = params[:host]
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                if ShopifyAPI::Context.embedded? && (!params[:embedded].present? || params[:embedded] != "1")
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  redirect_to(ShopifyAPI::Auth.embedded_app_url(params[:host]) + request.path, allow_other_host: true)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                else
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  # Try to find the shop record
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  shop = Shop.find_by(shopify_domain: @shop_origin)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  if shop && shop.shopify_token.present?
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    # If we have a shop and token, redirect to dashboard
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    redirect_to dashboard_path
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  elsif params[:shop].present?
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    # If we don't have a valid session but have a shop param,
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    # we'll get redirected to login by the ShopAccessScopesVerification concern
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    # This is just a placeholder - the redirect is handled by the concern
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    render :index
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  else
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    # If we don't have a shop param at all, show the login page
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    redirect_to login_path
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            end
          
      33.

              def job_run_json(job_run)

    32. 
            

            

                {
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33.

    34.

    35.

      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  started_at: job_run.started_at,
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  completed_at: job_run.completed_at,
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  duration: job_run.duration,
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  progress: job_run.progress_data || {},
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  error_message: job_run.error_message,
          
      41.

      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42.

      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              helper_method :job_status_color
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              def job_status_color(status)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                case status
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                when "completed" then "bg-success"
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                when "failed" then "bg-danger"
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                when "running" then "bg-primary"
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                when "queued" then "bg-warning"
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                else "bg-secondary"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

            end
          
      56.

              class AiProductAnalysesController < AuthenticatedController

                layout "authenticated"

                def index

    6. 
            

            

                  @pending_analyses = current_shop.ai_product_analyses.pending&.limit(10)

    7. 
            

            

                  @processing_analyses = current_shop.ai_product_analyses.processing&.limit(10)

                  # Load draft products with their AI analysis for confidence badges

                def show

                  analysis = current_shop.ai_product_analyses.find(params[:id])

      17.
