      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                def create
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  upload_start_time = Time.current
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "Upload images params: #{params.inspect}"
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  # Handle both direct uploads (signed_ids) and traditional uploads
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  uploaded_files = []
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  signed_ids = []
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  # Check for direct upload signed IDs (modern approach)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  if params[:images].present? && params[:images].all? { |img| img.is_a?(String) }
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.debug "Processing direct upload signed IDs"
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    signed_ids = params[:images]
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    # Convert signed IDs to blobs
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    uploaded_files = signed_ids.map do |signed_id|
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                      begin
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                        ActiveStorage::Blob.find_signed(signed_id)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                      rescue => e
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.error "Invalid signed ID #{signed_id}: #{e.message}"
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                        nil
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                      end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    end.compact
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.debug "Found #{uploaded_files.length} valid blobs from signed IDs"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  else
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    # Traditional file upload handling (fallback)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.debug "Processing traditional file uploads"
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    if params[:images].present?
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                      if params[:images].is_a?(Array)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                        uploaded_files = params[:images]
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                      elsif params[:images].is_a?(Hash) || params[:images].is_a?(ActionController::Parameters)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                        uploaded_files = params[:images].values
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                      elsif params[:images].is_a?(ActionDispatch::Http::UploadedFile)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                        uploaded_files = [ params[:images] ]
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                      else
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                        begin
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                          uploaded_files = Array(params[:images])
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                        rescue => e
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                          Rails.logger.error "Failed to convert images to array: #{e.message}"
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                        end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                      end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "Found #{uploaded_files.length} files to process"
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  if uploaded_files.empty?
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    respond_to do |format|
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                      format.html { redirect_to kuralis_ai_product_analyses_path, alert: "Please select at least one image to upload." }
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                      format.json { render json: { error: "No images provided" }, status: :unprocessable_entity }
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    return
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  # Determine if this is a bulk upload (more than 20 files)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  is_bulk_upload = uploaded_files.length > 20
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  successful_uploads = 0
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  failed_uploads = 0
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  analysis_ids = []
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  # Process files in batches for bulk uploads
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  if is_bulk_upload
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Processing bulk upload of #{uploaded_files.length} files"
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                    # Process in batches to avoid overwhelming the system
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    uploaded_files.each_slice(20) do |batch|
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                      batch_results = process_file_batch(batch)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                      successful_uploads += batch_results[:successful]
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                      failed_uploads += batch_results[:failed]
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                      analysis_ids.concat(batch_results[:analysis_ids])
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                      # Small delay between batches to prevent overwhelming the job queue
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                      sleep(0.1) if uploaded_files.length > 100
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                    end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  else
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                    # Process normally for smaller uploads
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                    batch_results = process_file_batch(uploaded_files)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                    successful_uploads = batch_results[:successful]
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                    failed_uploads = batch_results[:failed]
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                    analysis_ids = batch_results[:analysis_ids]
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  # Prepare response message
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  if successful_uploads > 0
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                    upload_duration = Time.current - upload_start_time
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Upload completed: #{successful_uploads} files processed in #{upload_duration.round(2)}s (avg: #{(upload_duration / successful_uploads).round(3)}s per file)"
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

            
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    message = "#{successful_uploads} #{'image'.pluralize(successful_uploads)} uploaded and queued for analysis."
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    message += " #{failed_uploads} #{'upload'.pluralize(failed_uploads)} failed." if failed_uploads > 0
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

            
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                    respond_to do |format|
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                      format.html {
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                        if is_bulk_upload
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                          redirect_to kuralis_ai_product_analyses_path(tab: "processing"),
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                                      notice: message + " Large uploads are processed in batches - check back in a few minutes for results."
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                        else
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                          redirect_to kuralis_ai_product_analyses_path(tab: "processing"), notice: message
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                        end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                      }
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                      format.json {
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                        render json: {
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                          success: true,
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                          message: message,
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                          successful: successful_uploads,
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                          failed: failed_uploads,
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                          analysis_ids: analysis_ids,
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                          is_bulk: is_bulk_upload,
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                          upload_duration: upload_duration.round(2),
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                          redirect_url: kuralis_ai_product_analyses_path(tab: "processing")
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                        }
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                      }
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  else
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    respond_to do |format|
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                      format.html { redirect_to kuralis_ai_product_analyses_path, alert: "No images were uploaded. Please try again." }
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                      format.json { render json: { success: false, error: "No images were uploaded" }, status: :unprocessable_entity }
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                    end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                end
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

            
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                def remove_image
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  analysis = current_shop.ai_product_analyses.find(params[:analysis_id])
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  if analysis.destroy
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                    respond_to do |format|
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                      format.html { redirect_to kuralis_ai_product_analyses_path, notice: "Image removed successfully." }
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                      format.json { head :no_content }
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                      format.turbo_stream {
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                        flash.now[:notice] = "Image removed successfully."
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                        render turbo_stream: [
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                          turbo_stream.remove("analysis_#{analysis.id}"),
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                          turbo_stream.prepend("flash", partial: "shared/flash")
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                        ]
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                      }
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                    end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  else
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                    respond_to do |format|
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                      format.html { redirect_to kuralis_ai_product_analyses_path, alert: "Failed to remove image." }
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                      format.json { render json: analysis.errors, status: :unprocessable_entity }
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                      format.turbo_stream {
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                        flash.now[:alert] = "Failed to remove image."
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                        render turbo_stream: turbo_stream.prepend("flash", partial: "shared/flash")
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                      }
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                    end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                private
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

            
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                def process_file_batch(files)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  successful = 0
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  failed = 0
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  analysis_ids = []
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  files.each_with_index do |file_or_blob, index|
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                      # Handle both ActiveStorage::Blob (direct upload) and UploadedFile (traditional)
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                      if file_or_blob.is_a?(ActiveStorage::Blob)
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                        # Direct upload - blob is already stored
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                        blob = file_or_blob
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                        filename = blob.filename.to_s
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                        content_type = blob.content_type
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                        file_size = blob.byte_size
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.debug "Processing direct upload blob #{index}: #{filename} (#{content_type}, #{file_size} bytes)"
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                      else
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                        # Traditional upload - need to validate
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                        uploaded_file = file_or_blob
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                        unless uploaded_file.respond_to?(:original_filename) && uploaded_file.respond_to?(:read)
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                          Rails.logger.warn "Item #{index} is not a valid file object: #{uploaded_file.class}"
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                          failed += 1
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                          next
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                        end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                        filename = uploaded_file.original_filename
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                        content_type = uploaded_file.content_type
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                        file_size = uploaded_file.size
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

            
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.debug "Processing traditional upload #{index}: #{filename} (#{content_type}, #{file_size} bytes)"
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                      end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

            
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                      # Validate file size (10MB limit)
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                      max_size = 10.megabytes
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                      if file_size > max_size
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.warn "File #{filename} is too large: #{file_size} bytes"
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                        failed += 1
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                        next
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                      end
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

            
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                      # Validate file type
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                      unless content_type&.start_with?("image/")
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.warn "File #{filename} is not an image: #{content_type}"
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                        failed += 1
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                        next
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                      end
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

            
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                      # Create analysis record
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                      analysis = current_shop.ai_product_analyses.new(
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                        status: "pending",
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                        image: filename
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                      )
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

            
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                      # Attach the file/blob
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                      if file_or_blob.is_a?(ActiveStorage::Blob)
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                        # For direct uploads, attach the existing blob
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                        analysis.image_attachment.attach(blob)
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                      else
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                        # For traditional uploads, attach the uploaded file
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                        analysis.image_attachment.attach(uploaded_file)
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                      end
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

            
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                      if analysis.save
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.debug "Successfully created analysis record for #{filename}"
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                        successful += 1
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                        analysis_ids << analysis.id
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

            
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                        # Queue jobs with smart delays
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                        if files.length > 50
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                          delay = (index * 2).seconds
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                          AiProductAnalysisJob.set(wait: delay).perform_later(current_shop.id, analysis.id)
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                        elsif files.length > 20
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                          delay = index.seconds
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                          AiProductAnalysisJob.set(wait: delay).perform_later(current_shop.id, analysis.id)
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                        else
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                          AiProductAnalysisJob.perform_later(current_shop.id, analysis.id)
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                        end
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                      else
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.error "Failed to save analysis: #{analysis.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                        failed += 1
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                      end
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                    rescue => e
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "Error processing file #{index}: #{e.message}"
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                      failed += 1
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                    end
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                  end
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

            
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                  { successful: successful, failed: failed, analysis_ids: analysis_ids }
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                end
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

              end
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

            end
          
      262.

    app/controllers/kuralis/bulk_listings_controller.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    105 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 105 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            module Kuralis
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              class BulkListingsController < AuthenticatedController
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                def index
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                  @platform = params[:platform]
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                  @platforms_available = %w[shopify ebay]
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  # Query products unlisted on the selected platform
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  case @platform
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  when "shopify"
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                    @products = current_shop.kuralis_products.where(shopify_product_id: nil, status: "active", is_draft: false)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  when "ebay"
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                    @products = current_shop.kuralis_products.where(ebay_listing_id: nil, status: "active", is_draft: false)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  when "all"
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    # Products unlisted on any platform
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    @products = current_shop.kuralis_products.unlinked
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  else
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    # Default to showing all products
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    @products = current_shop.kuralis_products
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  @total_count = @products.count
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  @products = @products.order(created_at: :desc).page(params[:page]).per(100)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  # Check for active bulk listing process
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  @active_job_run = find_active_bulk_listing_job
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                def create
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  platform = params[:platform] || []
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  # Ensure at least one platform is selected
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  if platform.empty?
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    redirect_to kuralis_products_path, alert: "Please select at least one platform for listing."
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    return
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  if params[:select_all] == "1"
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    # Get all product IDs except deselected ones
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    deselected_ids = JSON.parse(params[:deselected_ids] || "[]")
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    # Find eligible products for each platform and get the intersection
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    product_ids = []
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    if platform.include?("shopify")
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                      shopify_ids = current_shop.kuralis_products.where(shopify_product_id: nil, status: "active", is_draft: false).pluck(:id)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                      product_ids = product_ids.empty? ? shopify_ids : product_ids & shopify_ids
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                    end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    if platform.include?("ebay")
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                      ebay_ids = current_shop.kuralis_products.where(ebay_listing_id: nil, status: "active", is_draft: false).pluck(:id)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                      product_ids = product_ids.empty? ? ebay_ids : product_ids & ebay_ids
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    # Remove deselected products
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    product_ids = product_ids - deselected_ids
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  else
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    product_ids = params[:product_ids] || []
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  if product_ids.empty?
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    redirect_to kuralis_products_path, alert: "No eligible products selected for listing."
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    return
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  # Calculate estimated processing time based on batch size
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  batch_count = (product_ids.size.to_f / BulkListingJob::BATCH_SIZE).ceil
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  time_estimate = batch_count > 1 ? "#{batch_count} batches" : "1 batch"
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  job = BulkListingJob.perform_later(
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    shop_id: current_shop.id,
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    product_ids: product_ids,
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    platforms: platform
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  )
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  redirect_to kuralis_products_path,
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                              notice: "Bulk listing process started for #{product_ids.count} products (#{time_estimate}) on #{platform}. You can monitor progress in the jobs dashboard."
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                def progress
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  job_id = params[:job_id]
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  if job_id.present?
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    job_run = JobRun.find_by(job_id: job_id)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    if job_run
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                      render json: format_job_run_for_progress(job_run)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    else
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                      render json: { status: "not_found" }
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                    end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  else
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    # Look for the most recent active job
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                    job_run = find_active_bulk_listing_job
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                    if job_run
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                      render json: format_job_run_for_progress(job_run)
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                    else
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                      render json: { status: "not_found" }
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                    end
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  end
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                private
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                def find_active_bulk_listing_job
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  # Find the most recent running BulkListingJob
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  JobRun.where(
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    job_class: "BulkListingJob",
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    status: "running",
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    shop_id: current_shop.id
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  ).order(created_at: :desc).first
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                def format_job_run_for_progress(job_run)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  # Extract data from the job_run
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  arguments = job_run.arguments || {}
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  # Get job metadata
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  shop_id = arguments["shop_id"]
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  product_ids = arguments["product_ids"] || []
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  platform = arguments["platform"] || []
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  batch_index = arguments["batch_index"] || 0
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  total_batches = arguments["total_batches"] || 1
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  # Calculate estimated progress
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  estimated_percent_complete = 0
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  if batch_index > 0 && total_batches > 0
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                    estimated_percent_complete = ((batch_index.to_f / total_batches) * 100).round
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  end
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  # Build the response
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  {
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                    id: job_run.job_id,
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    status: job_run.status,
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                    started_at: job_run.started_at || job_run.created_at,
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                    shop_id: shop_id,
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                    platform: platform,
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                    total_batches: total_batches,
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                    batch_index: batch_index,
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                    product_count: product_ids.is_a?(Array) ? product_ids.size : 0,
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                    estimated_percent_complete: estimated_percent_complete
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  }
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                end
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

              end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

            end
          
      145.

              class DraftProductsController < AuthenticatedController

                before_action :set_sequential_session, only: [ :sequential_edit, :sequential_update, :sequential_skip, :sequential_delete ]
          
      6.

      7.

                def create
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  # DEPRECATED: Draft products are now created automatically after AI analysis
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  analysis = current_shop.ai_product_analyses.find(params[:analysis_id])
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  # Check if a draft already exists (should be created automatically)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  existing_product = KuralisProduct.find_by(ai_product_analysis_id: analysis.id, is_draft: true)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  if existing_product.present?
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    respond_to do |format|
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                      format.html { redirect_to edit_kuralis_product_path(existing_product, finalize: true), notice: "Draft product found. Redirecting to edit." }
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                      format.json { render json: { redirect: edit_kuralis_product_path(existing_product, finalize: true) } }
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  else
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    respond_to do |format|
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                      format.html { redirect_to kuralis_ai_product_analyses_path, notice: "Draft products are now created automatically. Please check the drafts tab." }
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                      format.json { render json: { message: "Draft products are created automatically" }, status: :ok }
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27.

                def create_all
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  # DEPRECATED: Draft products are now created automatically after AI analysis

                # GET /kuralis/draft_products/start_finalize_sequence
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                def start_finalize_sequence
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  # Get all draft products for the current shop, ordered by creation date
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  draft_products = current_shop.kuralis_products.draft.order(:created_at)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  if draft_products.empty?
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    redirect_to kuralis_ai_product_analyses_path(tab: "drafts"),
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                                alert: "No draft products available for finalization."
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    return
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  # Create a session to track the sequential finalization process
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  session[:sequential_finalization] = {
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    draft_ids: draft_products.pluck(:id),
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                    current_index: 0,
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    total_count: draft_products.count,
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    completed_count: 0,
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    skipped_ids: [],
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    started_at: Time.current
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  }
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  # Redirect to the first draft
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  redirect_to sequential_edit_kuralis_draft_products_path
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                # GET /kuralis/draft_products/sequential_edit
          
      59.

                def sequential_edit
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  unless @sequential_session
          
      61.

                    redirect_to kuralis_ai_product_analyses_path(tab: "drafts"),
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                                alert: "Sequential finalization session not found."
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    return
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  @current_draft = get_current_draft
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  unless @current_draft
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    # No more drafts to process
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    complete_sequential_session
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    return
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  end
          
      72.

      73.

                  # Prepare form data

                  @product = @current_draft

    75. 
            

            

                  @product.build_ebay_product_attribute unless @product.ebay_product_attribute
          
      76.

                  # Get confidence information

    81. 
            

            

                  @analysis = @current_draft.ai_product_analysis
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  render :sequential_edit

                # PATCH /kuralis/draft_products/sequential_update
          
      87.
