    1134. 
            

            

                # So we should keep the original value even if it's not in the list
          
      1135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1135. 
            

            

                if value_type == "text_with_suggestions"
          
      1136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1136. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Aspect '#{aspect['name']}' is text_with_suggestions - keeping original value: #{value}"
          
      1137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1137. 
            

            

                  return value
          
      1138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1138. 
            

            

                end
          
      1139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1139. 
            

            

            
          
      1140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1140. 
            

            

                # For select fields, we need to find a match in the allowed values
          
      1141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1141. 
            

            

                # Check for exact match
          
      1142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1142. 
            

            

                exact_match = allowed_values.find { |v| v.downcase == value.downcase }
          
      1143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1143. 
            

            

                return exact_match if exact_match
          
      1144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1144. 
            

            

            
          
      1145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1145. 
            

            

                # Check for partial match
          
      1146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1146. 
            

            

                partial_match = allowed_values.find { |v| v.downcase.include?(value.downcase) || value.downcase.include?(v.downcase) }
          
      1147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1147. 
            

            

                return partial_match if partial_match
          
      1148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1148. 
            

            

            
          
      1149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1149. 
            

            

                # If no match found and it's a strict select field, we might want to return nil or empty
          
      1150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1150. 
            

            

                # But for now, return original value (eBay may accept it anyway)
          
      1151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1151. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.warn "No match found for aspect '#{aspect['name']}' value '#{value}' in allowed values: #{allowed_values.first(5).join(', ')}#{allowed_values.size > 5 ? '...' : ''}"
          
      1152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1152. 
            

            

                value
          
      1153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1153. 
            

            

              end
          
      1154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1154. 
            

            

            
          
      1155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1155. 
            

            

              # Normalize aspect names for better matching
          
      1156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1156. 
            

            

              def normalize_aspect_name(name)
          
      1157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1157. 
            

            

                name.downcase
          
      1158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1158. 
            

            

                    .gsub(/[^a-z0-9\s]/, "")  # Remove special characters
          
      1159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1159. 
            

            

                    .gsub(/\s+/, " ")         # Normalize spaces
          
      1160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1160. 
            

            

                    .strip
          
      1161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1161. 
            

            

              end
          
      1162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1162. 
            

            

            
          
      1163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1163. 
            

            

              # Get semantic mappings for common aspect variations
          
      1164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1164. 
            

            

              def get_semantic_aspect_mapping(aspect_name)
          
      1165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1165. 
            

            

                mappings = {
          
      1166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1166. 
            

            

                  "brand" => [ "brand", "manufacturer", "make" ],
          
      1167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1167. 
            

            

                  "color" => [ "color", "colour", "main color" ],
          
      1168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1168. 
            

            

                  "size" => [ "size", "dimensions", "measurement" ],
          
      1169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1169. 
            

            

                  "material" => [ "material", "fabric", "composition" ],
          
      1170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1170. 
            

            

                  "condition" => [ "condition", "state", "grade" ],
          
      1171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1171. 
            

            

                  "year" => [ "year", "publication year", "release year", "vintage" ],
          
      1172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1172. 
            

            

                  "genre" => [ "genre", "category", "type", "style" ],
          
      1173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1173. 
            

            

                  "character" => [ "character", "characters", "main character" ],
          
      1174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1174. 
            

            

                  "publisher" => [ "publisher", "published by", "imprint" ],
          
      1175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1175. 
            

            

                  "series title" => [ "series", "series title", "title series" ],
          
      1176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1176. 
            

            

                  "issue number" => [ "issue", "issue number", "#", "number" ],
          
      1177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1177. 
            

            

                  "format" => [ "format", "type", "binding" ],
          
      1178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1178. 
            

            

                  "language" => [ "language", "text language" ],
          
      1179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1179. 
            

            

                  # Comic book specific mappings
          
      1180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1180. 
            

            

                  "publication month" => [ "publication month", "month", "cover date" ],
          
      1181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1181. 
            

            

                  "era" => [ "era", "age", "comic age", "publication era" ],
          
      1182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1182. 
            

            

                  "variant" => [ "variant", "variant cover", "cover variant", "special cover" ],
          
      1183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1183. 
            

            

                  "key issue" => [ "key issue", "first appearance", "origin", "death", "key" ],
          
      1184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1184. 
            

            

                  "grade" => [ "grade", "condition grade", "comic grade" ],
          
      1185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1185. 
            

            

                  "certification" => [ "certification", "cgc", "cbcs", "graded" ],
          
      1186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1186. 
            

            

                  "artist" => [ "artist", "penciler", "illustrator", "cover artist" ],
          
      1187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1187. 
            

            

                  "writer" => [ "writer", "author", "story by" ],
          
      1188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1188. 
            

            

                  "universe" => [ "universe", "marvel universe", "dc universe" ],
          
      1189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1189. 
            

            

                  "team" => [ "team", "superhero team", "group" ]
          
      1190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1190. 
            

            

                }
          
      1191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1191. 
            

            

            
          
      1192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1192. 
            

            

                mappings[aspect_name.downcase]
          
      1193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1193. 
            

            

              end
          
      1194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1194. 
            

            

            
          
      1195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1195. 
            

            

              # Default result when item specifics validation fails
          
      1196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1196. 
            

            

              def default_item_specifics_result(ai_item_specifics)
          
      1197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1197. 
            

            

                {
          
      1198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1198. 
            

            

                  validated_specifics: ai_item_specifics,
          
      1199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1199. 
            

            

                  confidence: 0.5,
          
      1200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1200. 
            

            

                  missing_required: [],
          
      1201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1201. 
            

            

                  available_aspects: []
          
      1202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1202. 
            

            

                }
          
      1203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1203. 
            

            

              end
          
      1204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1204. 
            

            

            
          
      1205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1205. 
            

            

              # Validate comic book specific requirements
          
      1206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1206. 
            

            

              def validate_comic_book_specifics(result)
          
      1207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1207. 
            

            

                item_specifics = result["item_specifics"] || {}
          
      1208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1208. 
            

            

            
          
      1209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1209. 
            

            

                # Check for critical comic book fields
          
      1210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1210. 
            

            

                issue_number = item_specifics["Issue Number"] || item_specifics["issue number"] ||
          
      1211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1211. 
            

            

                               item_specifics["Issue"] || item_specifics["#"]
          
      1212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1212. 
            

            

            
          
      1213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1213. 
            

            

                series_title = item_specifics["Series Title"] || item_specifics["series title"] ||
          
      1214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1214. 
            

            

                               item_specifics["Series"] || item_specifics["Title"]
          
      1215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1215. 
            

            

            
          
      1216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1216. 
            

            

                publisher = item_specifics["Publisher"] || item_specifics["publisher"] ||
          
      1217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1217. 
            

            

                            result["brand"]
          
      1218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1218. 
            

            

            
          
      1219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1219. 
            

            

                # Flag for review if critical fields are missing
          
      1220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1220. 
            

            

                missing_critical = []
          
      1221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1221. 
            

            

                missing_critical << "Issue Number" if issue_number.blank?
          
      1222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1222. 
            

            

                missing_critical << "Series Title" if series_title.blank?
          
      1223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1223. 
            

            

                missing_critical << "Publisher" if publisher.blank?
          
      1224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1224. 
            

            

            
          
      1225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1225. 
            

            

                if missing_critical.any?
          
      1226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1226. 
            

            

                  result["requires_specifics_review"] = true
          
      1227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1227. 
            

            

                  result["missing_critical_comic_fields"] = missing_critical
          
      1228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1228. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "Comic book missing critical fields: #{missing_critical.join(', ')}"
          
      1229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1229. 
            

            

                end
          
      1230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1230. 
            

            

            
          
      1231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1231. 
            

            

                # Enhance title with issue number if available and not already included
          
      1232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1232. 
            

            

                if issue_number.present? && series_title.present?
          
      1233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1233. 
            

            

                  enhanced_title = "#{series_title} ##{issue_number}"
          
      1234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1234. 
            

            

                  enhanced_title += " - #{publisher}" if publisher.present?
          
      1235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1235. 
            

            

            
          
      1236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1236. 
            

            

                  # Only update if current title doesn't already include issue number
          
      1237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1237. 
            

            

                  unless result["title"].include?("#") || result["title"].include?("Issue")
          
      1238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1238. 
            

            

                    result["title"] = enhanced_title
          
      1239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1239. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Enhanced comic title: #{enhanced_title}"
          
      1240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1240. 
            

            

                  end
          
      1241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1241. 
            

            

                end
          
      1242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1242. 
            

            

            
          
      1243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1243. 
            

            

                result
          
      1244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1244. 
            

            

              end
          
      1245.

            end

            class ApplicationJob < ActiveJob::Base
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              include JobTrackable
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              queue_as :default

              # Automatically retry jobs that encountered a deadlock
          
      7.

              # retry_on ActiveRecord::Deadlocked

            class BatchCacheKuralisProductImagesJob < ApplicationJob
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              queue_as :images
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def perform(shop_id, product_ids)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                return if product_ids.blank?
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                shop = Shop.find_by(id: shop_id)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                return unless shop
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "=== BATCH IMAGE MIGRATION STARTED ==="
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Processing image caching for batch of #{product_ids.size} products"
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                # Fetch all products at once to reduce DB queries
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                products = KuralisProduct.where(id: product_ids).includes(:ebay_listing)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Found #{products.size} products to process"
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                success_count = 0
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                failed_count = 0
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                skipped_count = 0
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                products.each do |product|
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Processing product ID: #{product.id}, title: #{product.title}"
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    # Skip if images are already attached
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    if product.images.attached?
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info "Skipping product #{product.id} - already has #{product.images.count} images attached"
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                      skipped_count += 1
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                      next
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    # Track if we successfully processed this product
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    processed = false
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    # Strategy 1: Try to copy from eBay listing if available and has images
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    if product.ebay_listing_id.present?
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                      ebay_listing = EbayListing.find_by(id: product.ebay_listing_id)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                      if ebay_listing.nil?
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.warn "Product #{product.id} has ebay_listing_id #{product.ebay_listing_id} but listing not found"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                      elsif ebay_listing.images.attached?
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.info "eBay listing #{ebay_listing.id} has #{ebay_listing.images.count} images, copying to product #{product.id}"
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                        if copy_images_from_ebay_listing(product, ebay_listing)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                          Rails.logger.info "Successfully copied #{ebay_listing.images.count} images from eBay listing #{ebay_listing.id} to product #{product.id}"
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                          success_count += 1
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                          processed = true
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                        else
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                          Rails.logger.warn "Failed to copy images from eBay listing #{ebay_listing.id} to product #{product.id}"
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                        end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                      else
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.warn "eBay listing #{ebay_listing.id} has no attached images for product #{product.id}, will try URL fallback"
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                      end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    # Strategy 2: Fallback to URL-based caching if we haven't processed yet
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    if !processed
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                      if product.image_urls.present? && product.image_urls.any?
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.info "Attempting URL-based image caching for product #{product.id} (#{product.image_urls.size} URLs)"
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                        if cache_images_from_urls(product)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                          Rails.logger.info "Successfully cached images from URLs for product #{product.id}"
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                          success_count += 1
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                          processed = true
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                        else
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                          Rails.logger.error "Failed to cache images from URLs for product #{product.id}"
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                        end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                      else
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.warn "Product #{product.id} has no eBay listing with images and no image URLs available"
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                      end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    # If still not processed, count as failed
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    if !processed
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                      failed_count += 1
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "Failed to process images for product #{product.id} - no viable image source found"
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    failed_count += 1
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Exception processing product #{product.id}: #{e.class} - #{e.message}"
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  end
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "=== BATCH IMAGE MIGRATION SUMMARY ==="
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Total products: #{products.size}"
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Successfully processed: #{success_count}"
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Skipped (already had images): #{skipped_count}"
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Failed: #{failed_count}"
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "=== END BATCH SUMMARY ==="
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                # If there are failures, we might want to retry later
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                if failed_count > 0
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "#{failed_count} products failed image migration. Consider retrying later when eBay images are downloaded."
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

              end
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

              private
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

              def copy_images_from_ebay_listing(product, ebay_listing)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                image_count = 0
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                failed_count = 0
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                begin
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Attempting to copy #{ebay_listing.images.count} images from eBay listing #{ebay_listing.id} to product #{product.id}"
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  ebay_listing.images.each_with_index do |image, index|
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                      # Verify the blob exists before trying to attach
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                      unless image.blob.present?
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.error "Image #{index + 1} from eBay listing #{ebay_listing.id} has no blob - skipping"
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                        failed_count += 1
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                        next
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                      end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                      # Try to attach the image blob
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                      product.images.attach(image.blob)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                      image_count += 1
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.debug "Successfully attached image #{index + 1}/#{ebay_listing.images.count} to product #{product.id}"
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

            
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    rescue ActiveStorage::FileNotFoundError => e
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "Image file not found for image #{index + 1} from eBay listing #{ebay_listing.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                      failed_count += 1
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                    rescue => e
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "Failed to copy image #{index + 1} (ID: #{image.id}) from eBay listing #{ebay_listing.id} to product #{product.id}: #{e.class} - #{e.message}"
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                      failed_count += 1
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                    end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  if image_count > 0
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    # Update timestamp
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                    product.update_columns(images_last_synced_at: Time.current)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                    if failed_count > 0
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.warn "Partially successful: copied #{image_count}/#{ebay_listing.images.count} images to product #{product.id} (#{failed_count} failed)"
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                    else
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info "Successfully copied all #{image_count} images from eBay listing #{ebay_listing.id} to product #{product.id}"
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                    end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                    true
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  else
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Failed to copy any images from eBay listing #{ebay_listing.id} to product #{product.id} (#{failed_count} failures out of #{ebay_listing.images.count} images)"
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                    false
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Critical error copying images from eBay listing #{ebay_listing.id} to product #{product.id}: #{e.class} - #{e.message}"
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  false
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

              end
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

              def cache_images_from_urls(product)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                return false if product.image_urls.blank?
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                cached_count = 0
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                begin
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  product.image_urls.each_with_index do |url, index|
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                      # Skip if URL is blank or malformed
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                      next if url.blank? || !url.match?(/\Ahttps?:\/\//)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

            
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                      # Use Down for robust downloads with timeout
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                      temp_file = Down.download(url,
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                        max_size: 10 * 1024 * 1024,  # 10MB limit
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                        open_timeout: 30,             # 30 second timeout
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                        read_timeout: 60              # 60 second read timeout
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                      )
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                      product.images.attach(
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                        io: temp_file,
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                        filename: "product_image_#{product.id}_#{index}.jpg",
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                        content_type: temp_file.content_type || "image/jpeg"
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                      )
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                      cached_count += 1
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.debug "Successfully cached image #{index + 1}/#{product.image_urls.size} for product #{product.id}"
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                    rescue Down::Error => e
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "Download failed for image #{index + 1} (#{url}) for product #{product.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                    rescue => e
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "Failed to cache image #{index + 1} (#{url}) for product #{product.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                    ensure
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                      temp_file&.close
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                      temp_file&.unlink
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                    end
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  if cached_count > 0
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                    product.update_columns(images_last_synced_at: Time.current)
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Successfully cached #{cached_count}/#{product.image_urls.size} images for product #{product.id}"
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                    true
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                  else
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn "No images were successfully cached for product #{product.id}"
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                    false
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  end
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

            
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error caching images from URLs for product #{product.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  false
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                end
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

              end
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

            end
          
      205.

    app/jobs/bulk_listing_job.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    50 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 50 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            class BulkListingJob < ApplicationJob
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              queue_as :default
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              # Optimal batch size for Shopify bulk operations
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              SHOPIFY_BATCH_SIZE = 250  # Shopify's bulk mutation can handle up to 250 items
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              # Initial delay between batches (seconds)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              INITIAL_BATCH_SPACING = 60  # Start the first few batches with 1 minute spacing
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              # Batch size for chunking product processing
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              BATCH_SIZE = 50
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              # Main entry point - enqueues a single batch job per platform
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              def perform(shop_id:, product_ids:, platforms:, **_kwargs)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                shop = Shop.find(shop_id)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                NotificationService.create(
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  shop: shop,
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  title: "Bulk Listing Started",
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  message: "Started processing #{product_ids.size} products across #{platforms} platforms.",
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  category: "bulk_listing",
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  status: "info"
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                )
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                Array(platforms).each do |platform|
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  case platform
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  when "shopify"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    # Calculate optimal batching
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    total_batches = (product_ids.size.to_f / SHOPIFY_BATCH_SIZE).ceil
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    # Process batches with initial spacing to avoid conflicts
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    # This gives time for the first batch to complete its bulk operation
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    # before subsequent batches start trying
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    total_batches.times do |batch_index|
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                      start_idx = batch_index * SHOPIFY_BATCH_SIZE
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                      batch_ids = product_ids[start_idx, SHOPIFY_BATCH_SIZE].compact
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                      next if batch_ids.empty?
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                      # Space out the first few batches to avoid initial conflicts
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                      # Later batches will rely on the retry mechanism
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                      delay = batch_index < 3 ? (batch_index * INITIAL_BATCH_SPACING) : 0
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                      Shopify::BatchCreateListingsJob.set(wait: delay.seconds).perform_later(
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                        shop_id: shop.id,
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                        product_ids: batch_ids,
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                        batch_index: batch_index,
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                        total_batches: total_batches
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                      )
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info "Queued Shopify batch #{batch_index + 1}/#{total_batches} with #{batch_ids.size} products (delay: #{delay}s)"
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  when "ebay"
          
      55.

                    product_ids.each_slice(BATCH_SIZE).with_index do |batch_ids, batch_index|
          
      56.

                      Ebay::BatchCreateListingsJob.perform_later(
          
      57.

                        shop_id: shop.id,

      59.

      61.

      62.

                  end

      64.

                NotificationService.create(
          
      66.

                  shop: shop,

            class CacheEbayImagesJob < ApplicationJob
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              queue_as :images
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              include JobTrackable
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              # Limit concurrent downloads to avoid overloading the server
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # throttle threshold: 5, key: -> { "ebay_image_cache" }
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              # Process in batches of 10 to avoid memory issues
          
      9.

              BATCH_SIZE = 10

    10.

              def perform(account_id, listing_ids)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                @job_run = JobRun.find_by(job_id: job_id)

    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                # Early return if no listings to process
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                if listing_ids.blank?

    16.

                update_job_status(

                # Find the account

                # Process listings in batches to manage memory usage

                listing_ids.each_slice(BATCH_SIZE).with_index do |batch_ids, batch_index|

                    rescue => e

      43.

      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    # Update progress
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    overall_index = (batch_index * BATCH_SIZE) + index + 1
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                    update_job_status(
          
      48.

              def update_job_status(total: nil, processed: nil, message: nil)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                return unless @job_run
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                progress_data = @job_run.progress_data || {}
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                progress_data[:total] = total if total
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                progress_data[:processed] = processed if processed
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                progress_data[:message] = message if message
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                progress_data[:percent] = ((progress_data[:processed].to_f / progress_data[:total]) * 100).round(2) if progress_data[:total].to_i > 0
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                @job_run.update(progress_data: progress_data)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

              end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              def cache_images_for_listing(listing)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                return if listing.images.attached? || listing.image_urls.blank?
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                # Download and attach each image
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                listing.image_urls.each_with_index do |url, index|
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    # Skip if URL is blank or malformed
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    next if url.blank? || !url.match?(/\Ahttps?:\/\//)
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    # Use Down for robust downloads
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    temp_file = Down.download(url, max_size: 10 * 1024 * 1024)
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    listing.images.attach(
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                      io: temp_file,
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                      filename: "ebay_image_#{listing.ebay_item_id}_#{index}.jpg",
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                      content_type: temp_file.content_type || "image/jpeg"
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    )
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  rescue Down::Error => e
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error("Failed to download image from #{url}: #{e.message}")
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error("Failed to cache image from #{url}: #{e.message}")
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  ensure
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                    temp_file&.close
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                    temp_file&.unlink
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

              end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

            end
          
      99.

            class CacheKuralisProductImagesJob < ApplicationJob
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              queue_as :images
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def perform(shop_id, product_id)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                product = KuralisProduct.find_by(id: product_id)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                return unless product
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                # Skip if images are already attached
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                return if product.images.attached?
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                # Check if this product has an associated eBay listing with images
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                if product.ebay_listing_id.present? &&
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                   (ebay_listing = EbayListing.find_by(id: product.ebay_listing_id)) &&
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                   ebay_listing.images.attached?
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  # Copy images from eBay listing instead of re-downloading
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  copy_images_from_ebay_listing(product, ebay_listing)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Successfully copied attached images from eBay listing #{ebay_listing.id} to KuralisProduct #{product.id}"
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                elsif product.image_urls.present?
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  # Fallback to traditional URL-based image caching if necessary
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  product.cache_images
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Successfully cached images from URLs for KuralisProduct #{product.id}"
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Failed to cache images for KuralisProduct #{product_id}: #{e.message}"
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              private
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              def copy_images_from_ebay_listing(product, ebay_listing)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                ebay_listing.images.each do |image|
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  # Create a new attachment that points to the same blob
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  product.images.attach(image.blob)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                product.update(images_last_synced_at: Time.current)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            end
          
      39.

    app/jobs/cross_platform_inventory_sync_job.rb

    0.0% lines covered
