            class InventoryHealthCheckJob < ApplicationJob
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              queue_as :monitoring
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              # Run this job every 15 minutes for active monitoring
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              def perform
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Starting scheduled inventory health check"
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                # Check health for all shops
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                Shop.active.find_each do |shop|
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                    health_summary = InventoryMonitoringService.check_inventory_health(shop.id)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                    # Log summary for each shop
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Health check completed for shop_id=#{shop.id}: #{health_summary[:overall_status]} " \
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                                     "(#{health_summary[:total_alerts]} alerts)"
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    # Store health metrics in cache for dashboard
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    Rails.cache.write(
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                      "inventory_health:#{shop.id}",
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                      health_summary,
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                      expires_in: 20.minutes
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    )
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Failed health check for shop_id=#{shop.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    # Create error notification
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    Notification.create!(
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                      shop_id: shop.id,
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                      title: "Health Check Error",
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                      message: "Failed to perform inventory health check: #{e.message}",
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                      category: "system",
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                      status: "error",
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                      metadata: {
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                        error: e.message,
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                        error_class: e.class.name,
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                        timestamp: Time.current
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                      }
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    )
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Completed scheduled inventory health check"
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            end
          
      47.

    app/jobs/migrate_ebay_listings_job.rb

    0.0% lines covered

            class MigrateEbayListingsJob < ApplicationJob
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              ############################################################
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              # This job is used to migrate eBay listings to KuralisProducts
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              ############################################################
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              include JobTrackable
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              queue_as :default
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              # Configure batch size for processing
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              BATCH_SIZE = 100
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              def perform(shop_id, listing_ids)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                @job_run = JobRun.find_by(job_id: job_id)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                shop = Shop.find(shop_id)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                shopify_ebay_account = shop.shopify_ebay_account
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                # Early return if nothing to process
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                if listing_ids.blank?
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  update_job_status(message: "No listings to process")
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  return
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "=== STARTING EBAY LISTINGS MIGRATION ==="
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Processing #{listing_ids.size} listings for shop #{shop.shopify_domain}"
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                update_job_status(
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  total: listing_ids.size,
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  processed: 0,
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  message: "Starting migration of #{listing_ids.size} eBay listings"
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                )
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                # Prefetch all listings in one query to avoid N+1 queries
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                listings_to_process = shopify_ebay_account.ebay_listings
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                                        .includes(:kuralis_product) # eager load associations
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                                        .where(id: listing_ids)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                                        .to_a
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                # Skip listings that already have a KuralisProduct
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                initial_count = listings_to_process.size
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                listings_to_process.reject! { |listing| listing.kuralis_product.present? }
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                skipped_count = initial_count - listings_to_process.size
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Found #{listings_to_process.size} listings to migrate (#{skipped_count} already migrated)"
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                if skipped_count > 0
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  update_job_status(message: "Skipped #{skipped_count} already migrated listings")
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                # Prefetch necessary mappings to avoid repeated lookups
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                shipping_profile_weights = shopify_ebay_account.shipping_profile_weights || {}
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                category_tag_mappings = shopify_ebay_account.category_tag_mappings || {}
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                total_success = 0
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                total_failed = 0
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                failed_listings = []
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                # Process in batches to reduce memory usage and improve DB performance
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                listings_to_process.each_slice(BATCH_SIZE).with_index do |batch, batch_index|
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Processing batch #{batch_index + 1}/#{(listings_to_process.size.to_f / BATCH_SIZE).ceil} (#{batch.size} listings)"
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  # Prepare bulk insert data
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  kuralis_products_data = []
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  batch_failed = []
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  batch.each do |listing|
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                      # Get weight from shipping profile mapping (using preloaded data)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                      weight_oz = get_weight_from_cached_mapping(
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                        shipping_profile_weights,
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                        listing.shipping_profile_id.to_s
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                      ) || 0
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                      # Get tags from store category mapping (using preloaded data)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                      tags = get_tags_from_cached_mapping(
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                        category_tag_mappings,
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                        listing.store_category_id.to_s
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                      )
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                      # Prepare data for bulk creation
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                      kuralis_products_data << {
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                        shop_id: shop.id,
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                        title: listing.title,
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                        description: listing.description,
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                        base_price: listing.sale_price,
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                        base_quantity: listing.quantity,
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                        initial_quantity: listing.quantity,
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                        sku: nil, # We'll need to generate this
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                        brand: listing.item_specifics["Brand"],
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                        condition: listing.condition_description,
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                        location: listing.location,
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                        image_urls: listing.image_urls,
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                        images_last_synced_at: Time.current,
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                        product_attributes: listing.item_specifics,
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                        source_platform: "ebay",
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                        status: listing.active? ? "active" : "inactive",
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                        ebay_listing_id: listing.id,
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                        last_synced_at: Time.current,
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                        weight_oz: weight_oz,
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                        tags: tags,
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                        created_at: Time.current,
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                        updated_at: Time.current,
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                        imported_at: Time.current
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                      }
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                    rescue => e
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "Failed to prepare data for eBay listing #{listing.id} (#{listing.title}): #{e.message}"
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                      batch_failed << { listing_id: listing.id, title: listing.title, error: e.message }
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  if kuralis_products_data.any?
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                      # Create all products in a single transaction
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                      KuralisProduct.transaction do
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                        new_products = KuralisProduct.insert_all!(
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                          kuralis_products_data,
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                          returning: %w[id ebay_listing_id image_urls]
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                        )
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                        batch_success_count = new_products.count
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                        total_success += batch_success_count
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

            
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.info "Successfully migrated #{batch_success_count} eBay listings in batch #{batch_index + 1}"
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

            
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                        # Batch image caching instead of creating a job for each product
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                        product_ids_for_image_caching = new_products
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                          .select { |p| p["image_urls"].present? }
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                          .map { |p| p["id"] }
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                        if product_ids_for_image_caching.any?
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                          # Process images in batches of 50
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                          product_ids_for_image_caching.each_slice(50) do |batch_ids|
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                            BatchCacheKuralisProductImagesJob.perform_later(shop.id, batch_ids)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                          end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                          Rails.logger.info "Scheduled #{product_ids_for_image_caching.size} products for image caching in batches"
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                        end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                      end
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                    rescue => e
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "Failed to bulk insert batch #{batch_index + 1}: #{e.class} - #{e.message}"
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                      # Mark entire batch as failed
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                      batch.each do |listing|
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                        batch_failed << { listing_id: listing.id, title: listing.title, error: "Bulk insert failed: #{e.message}" }
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                      end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                    end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  # Track failed listings
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  total_failed += batch_failed.size
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  failed_listings.concat(batch_failed)
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                  # Update progress
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  processed_so_far = total_success + total_failed
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  update_job_status(
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                    processed: processed_so_far,
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                    message: "Processed #{processed_so_far}/#{listings_to_process.size} listings (#{total_success} successful, #{total_failed} failed)"
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  )
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                # Final summary
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "=== MIGRATION COMPLETED ==="
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Total listings processed: #{listings_to_process.size}"
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Successfully migrated: #{total_success}"
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Failed to migrate: #{total_failed}"
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                if failed_listings.any?
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Failed listings details:"
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  failed_listings.each do |failure|
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "  - Listing ID #{failure[:listing_id]} (#{failure[:title]}): #{failure[:error]}"
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

            
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "=== END MIGRATION ==="
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                # Send notification about completion
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                create_completion_notification(shop, total_success, total_failed, failed_listings)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                # Update final job status
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                update_job_status(
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  processed: listings_to_process.size,
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  message: "Migration completed: #{total_success} successful, #{total_failed} failed"
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                )
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Critical error in MigrateEbayListingsJob: #{e.class} - #{e.message}"
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                update_job_status(message: "Migration failed: #{e.message}")
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                # Send error notification
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                create_error_notification(shop, e.message)
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                raise # Re-raise to mark job as failed
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

              end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

            
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

              private
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

            
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

              def update_job_status(total: nil, processed: nil, message: nil)
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                return unless @job_run
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

            
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                progress_data = @job_run.progress_data || {}
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                progress_data[:total] = total if total
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                progress_data[:processed] = processed if processed
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                progress_data[:message] = message if message
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                progress_data[:percent] = ((progress_data[:processed].to_f / progress_data[:total]) * 100).round(2) if progress_data[:total].to_i > 0
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                @job_run.update(progress_data: progress_data)
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

              end
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

            
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

              def create_completion_notification(shop, success_count, failed_count, failed_listings)
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                if failed_count == 0
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                  # All successful
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                  Notification.create!(
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                    shop_id: shop.id,
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                    title: "eBay Migration Completed Successfully",
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                    message: "Successfully migrated #{success_count} eBay listings to Kuralis products.",
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                    category: "ebay_migration"
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                  )
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                else
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                  # Some failures
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  message = "Migration completed with #{success_count} successful and #{failed_count} failed migrations."
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

            
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                  if failed_listings.size <= 5
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                    message += "\n\nFailed listings:\n"
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                    failed_listings.each do |failure|
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                      message += " #{failure[:title]} (ID: #{failure[:listing_id]}): #{failure[:error]}\n"
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                    end
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                  else
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                    message += "\n\nFirst 5 failed listings:\n"
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                    failed_listings.first(5).each do |failure|
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                      message += " #{failure[:title]} (ID: #{failure[:listing_id]}): #{failure[:error]}\n"
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                    end
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                    message += "\n... and #{failed_listings.size - 5} more. Check logs for details."
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                  end
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

            
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                  Notification.create!(
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                    shop_id: shop.id,
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                    title: "eBay Migration Completed with Errors",
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                    message: message,
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                    category: "ebay_migration"
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                  )
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                end
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

              end
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

            
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

              def create_error_notification(shop, error_message)
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                Notification.create!(
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                  shop_id: shop.id,
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                  title: "eBay Migration Failed",
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                  message: "Migration job failed with error: #{error_message}. Please check logs for details.",
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                  category: "ebay_migration"
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                )
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

              end
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

            
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

              # Use cached weight mapping for performance
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

              def get_weight_from_cached_mapping(mapping, shipping_profile_id)
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                return nil if shipping_profile_id.blank?
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

            
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                weight_mapping = mapping[shipping_profile_id]
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                weight_mapping.present? ? weight_mapping.to_d : nil
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

              end
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

            
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

              # Use cached tag mapping for performance
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

              def get_tags_from_cached_mapping(mapping, store_category_id)
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                return [] if store_category_id.blank?
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

            
          
      268.

                tags_mapping = mapping[store_category_id]

                tags_mapping.present? ? Array(tags_mapping) : []

            class ProcessInventoryTransactionsJob < ApplicationJob

              # Process pending inventory transactions for a product
          
      5.

      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                return unless kuralis_product
          
      11.

            class PurgeUnattachedBlobsJob < ApplicationJob
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              queue_as :default
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def perform
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                # Clean up blobs that were uploaded but never attached to a record
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                # This happens with direct uploads when users upload files but don't submit the form
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Starting cleanup of unattached blobs"
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                unattached_blobs = ActiveStorage::Blob
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  .unattached
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  .where(created_at: ..1.day.ago) # Only purge blobs older than 1 day
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                count = unattached_blobs.count
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                if count > 0
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Found #{count} unattached blobs to purge"
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  unattached_blobs.find_each(&:purge_later)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Queued #{count} blobs for purging"
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                else
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "No unattached blobs found to purge"
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            end
          
      25.

            class ReconcileInventoryJob < ApplicationJob
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              queue_as :default
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              # How many products to process per batch
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              BATCH_SIZE = 100
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              # Retry options specific to this job
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              retry_on StandardError, wait: :polynomially_longer, attempts: 3
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              def perform(shop_id = nil, options = {})
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                # Track start time for performance monitoring
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                start_time = Time.current
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                # Set defaults
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                options = {
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  batch_size: BATCH_SIZE,
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  recently_updated_only: false
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                }.merge(options)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                if shop_id
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  # Process a specific shop
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  reconcile_for_shop(shop_id, options)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                else
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  # Process all shops, with a small delay between each to prevent overloading
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  Shop.find_each do |shop|
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    # Skip if no products
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    next unless shop.kuralis_products.exists?
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    # Process each shop in its own job to improve parallelization
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    ReconcileInventoryJob.perform_later(shop.id, options)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                # Log completion time
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                duration = Time.current - start_time
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                if shop_id
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Completed inventory reconciliation for shop_id=#{shop_id} in #{duration.round(2)}s"
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                else
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Scheduled inventory reconciliation for all shops in #{duration.round(2)}s"
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              private
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              def reconcile_for_shop(shop_id, options)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                shop = Shop.find(shop_id)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                count = 0
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                errors = 0
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                # Build the query for products to reconcile
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                products_scope = shop.kuralis_products
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                # Optionally limit to recently updated products only
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                if options[:recently_updated_only]
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  products_scope = products_scope.where("updated_at > ?", 24.hours.ago)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                # Process in batches to prevent memory issues with large datasets
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                products_scope.find_in_batches(batch_size: options[:batch_size]) do |batch|
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  batch.each do |product|
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                      InventoryService.reconcile_inventory(kuralis_product: product)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                      count += 1
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    rescue => e
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      errors += 1
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "Failed to reconcile product_id=#{product.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  # Log progress for larger shops
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Reconciled batch of #{options[:batch_size]} products for shop_id=#{shop_id}, #{count} processed, #{errors} errors"
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  # Small sleep to allow other processes to run
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  sleep(0.1)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                # Create notification if there were errors
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                if errors > 0
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  Notification.create!(
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    shop_id: shop_id,
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    title: "Inventory Reconciliation",
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                    message: "Completed with #{errors} errors. Please check logs.",
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    category: "inventory",
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                    status: errors > 10 ? "error" : "warning",
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    metadata: {
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                      processed: count,
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                      errors: errors
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                    }
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  )
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Completed inventory reconciliation for shop_id=#{shop_id}: #{count} products processed, #{errors} errors"
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

              end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

            end
          
      95.

    app/jobs/shop_redact_job.rb

            class ShopRedactJob < ActiveJob::Base
          
      2.

              extend ShopifyAPI::Webhooks::Handler
          
      3.

      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              class << self
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                def handle(topic:, shop:, body:)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  perform_later(topic: topic, shop_domain: shop, webhook: body)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                end
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              end
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9.

    10. 
            

            

              def perform(topic:, shop_domain:, webhook:)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                shop = Shop.find_by(shopify_domain: shop_domain)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13.

                if shop.nil?
          
      14.

                  logger.error("#{self.class} failed: cannot find shop with domain '#{shop_domain}'")
          
      15.

                shop.with_shopify_session do

              end

    app/jobs/shopify/batch_create_listings_job.rb

            require "tempfile"
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            require "net/http"
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            module Shopify
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              class BatchCreateListingsJob < ApplicationJob
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                include HTTParty
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                queue_as :shopify
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                POLL_INTERVAL = 5.seconds # How often to check bulk operation status
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                MAX_RETRIES = 5
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                RETRY_DELAY = 5.seconds
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                SSL_MAX_RETRIES = 5  # More retries for SSL issues
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                SSL_RETRY_DELAY = 10.seconds  # Longer delay between SSL retry attempts
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                BATCH_SIZE = 250 # Maximum number of images per bulk upload
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                # Bulk operation retry configuration
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                BULK_OP_MAX_RETRIES = 12  # Up to 1 hour of retries (with exponential backoff)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                BULK_OP_INITIAL_RETRY_DELAY = 30.seconds
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                BULK_OP_MAX_DELAY = 600.seconds  # Cap at 10 minutes
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                # Redis keys for tracking overall progress
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                REDIS_KEY_PREFIX = "shopify_bulk_import"
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                attr_reader :job_run_id
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                def perform(shop_id:, product_ids:, batch_index:, total_batches:)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  @shop = Shop.find(shop_id)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  @client = ShopifyAPI::Clients::Graphql::Admin.new(session: @shop.shopify_session)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  @batch_index = batch_index
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  @total_batches = total_batches
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  @retries = 0
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  # Generate a unique job run ID for this import session
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  @job_run_id = generate_or_retrieve_job_run_id
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  # Track batch start in Redis
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  update_batch_status("started")
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "[ShopifyBatch] Starting batch #{batch_index + 1}/#{total_batches} with #{product_ids.size} products (Job Run ID: #{@job_run_id})"
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  # Process the batch and track its completion
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  process_batch(product_ids)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                # Method to get progress information for this job
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                def progress_info
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  Shopify::BulkImportTracker.for_job(self)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                private
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                # Robust retry method that handles SSL connection errors
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                def with_retries(max_retries: MAX_RETRIES, retry_delay: RETRY_DELAY, ssl_retry: false, operation: "API call")
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  retries = 0
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  ssl_retries = 0
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    yield
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  rescue OpenSSL::SSL::SSLError, Errno::ECONNRESET, EOFError, Net::ReadTimeout, Net::OpenTimeout => e
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    ssl_retries += 1
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    max = ssl_retry ? SSL_MAX_RETRIES : MAX_RETRIES
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    delay = ssl_retry ? SSL_RETRY_DELAY : RETRY_DELAY
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    if ssl_retries <= max
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.warn "[ShopifyBatch] SSL connection error during #{operation}: #{e.class} - #{e.message}. Retrying in #{delay} seconds (#{ssl_retries}/#{max})"
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      sleep delay
