                def perform(shop_id, last_sync_time = nil)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  shop = Shop.find(shop_id)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  client = ShopifyAPI::Clients::Graphql::Admin.new(session: shop.shopify_session)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                    # Track existing products before import
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                    existing_product_ids = shop.shopify_products.pluck(:shopify_product_id)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                    processed_product_ids = []
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                    after_cursor = nil
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    loop do
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                      response = client.query(
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                        query: products_query,
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                        variables: {
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                          first: 10,
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                          after: after_cursor,
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                          query: nil
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                        }
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                      )
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                      products = response.body["data"]["products"]["edges"]
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                      processed_product_ids += process_products(products, shop)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                      page_info = response.body["data"]["products"]["pageInfo"]
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                      if page_info["hasNextPage"]
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                        after_cursor = response.body["data"]["products"]["edges"].last["cursor"]
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                      else
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                        break
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                      end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    # Handle deletions - mark products as inactive if they no longer exist in Shopify
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    deleted_product_ids = existing_product_ids - processed_product_ids
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    if deleted_product_ids.any?
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                      shop.shopify_products
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                          .where(shopify_product_id: deleted_product_ids)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                          .update_all(
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                            status: "deleted",
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                            last_synced_at: Time.current
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                          )
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info "Marked #{deleted_product_ids.size} products as deleted"
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Completed Shopify products import for shop #{shop.id}"
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Error importing Shopify products: #{e.message}"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53.

      54.

      55.

                def process_products(products, shop)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  processed_ids = []
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  products.each do |edge|
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                      product = edge["node"]
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      variant = product["variants"]["edges"].first["node"]
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                      product_id = extract_id_from_gid(product["id"])
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                      processed_ids << product_id
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                      variant_id = extract_id_from_gid(variant["id"])
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                      image_urls = product["images"]["edges"].map { |img| img["node"]["url"] }
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                      shopify_product = shop.shopify_products.find_or_initialize_by(
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                        shopify_product_id: product_id
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                      )
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                      shopify_product.assign_attributes({
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                        shopify_variant_id: variant_id,
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                        title: product["title"],
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                        description: product["description"],
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                        price: variant["price"],
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                        quantity: variant["inventoryQuantity"],
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                        sku: variant["sku"],
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                        status: product["status"].downcase,
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                        published: product["publishedAt"].present?,
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                        handle: product["handle"],
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87.

      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                        vendor: product["vendor"],
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                        tags: product["tags"],
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                        options: product["options"]&.map { |opt| { name: opt["name"], values: opt["values"] } },
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                        image_urls: image_urls,
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                        last_synced_at: Time.current
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                      })
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                      if shopify_product.changed?
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.info "Changes detected for product #{product_id}: #{shopify_product.changes.inspect}"
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                        if shopify_product.save
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98.

      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99.

      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                        else
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                          Rails.logger.error "Failed to save product #{product_id}: #{shopify_product.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                        end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                      else
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                        shopify_product.sync_images if shopify_product.needs_image_sync?
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.info "No changes detected for product #{product_id}"
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                      end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    rescue => e
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "Error processing product: #{e.message}"
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109.

      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                    end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  end
          
      112.

      113.

                def products_query

      118.

      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                      products(first: $first, after: $after, query: $query) {

                        edges {
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                          cursor
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                          node {
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                            id
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                            title
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                            description
          
      126.

                            handle

    127. 
            

            

                            productType
          
      128.

    132. 
            

            

                            options {
          
      133.

      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                              values
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135.

    136.

                def extract_id_from_gid(gid)
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  return nil if gid.blank?
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  # Extract the numeric ID from formats like "gid://shopify/Product/12345"
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  gid.split("/").last
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                rescue
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Failed to extract ID from GID: #{gid}"
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

            end

    app/jobs/shopify/sync_orders_job.rb

    0.0% lines covered

            module Shopify
          
      2.

              class SyncOrdersJob < ApplicationJob
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                ##############################################################
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                ############## Sync Orders from Shopify to Kuralis ###########
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                ##############################################################
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                # TODO: We have no approval currently to retrieve customer data from shopify so for now we wont have access to the customer info or shipping info.
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                # TODO: We will need to add approval for this in the future.
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                ##############################################################
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                queue_as :default
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                OLDER_ORDERS_CHECK_INTERVAL = 6.hours
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                RECENT_WINDOW = 72.hours
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                EXTENDED_WINDOW = 30.days
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                def perform(shop_id = nil)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  if shop_id
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    sync_shop(Shop.find(shop_id))
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  else
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    Shop.find_each do |shop|
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                      next unless shop.shopify_session # Skip shops without Shopify connection
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                      begin
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                        sync_shop(shop)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                      rescue => e
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.error "Failed to sync Shopify orders for shop #{shop.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                      end
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                private
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                def sync_shop(shop)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  @shop = shop
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  @client = ShopifyAPI::Clients::Graphql::Admin.new(session: @shop.shopify_session)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  # Always process recent orders
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  process_recent_orders
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  # Check older unfulfilled orders less frequently
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  process_older_unfulfilled_orders if should_check_older_orders?
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                def process_recent_orders
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  start_time = RECENT_WINDOW.ago.iso8601
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  orders_response = fetch_orders(start_time)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  process_orders(orders_response)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Processed recent orders for shop #{@shop.id}"
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                def fetch_orders(start_time)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  after_cursor = nil
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  all_orders = []
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  loop do
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    response = @client.query(
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                      query: orders_query,
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                      variables: {
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                        first: 50,
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                        after: after_cursor,
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                        query: "created_at:>='#{start_time}'"
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      }
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    )
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    raise "Shopify API Error: #{response.body['errors']}" if response.body["errors"]
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    orders = response.body["data"]["orders"]["edges"]
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    break if orders.empty?
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    all_orders += orders.map { |edge| edge["node"] }
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    page_info = response.body["data"]["orders"]["pageInfo"]
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    break unless page_info["hasNextPage"]
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    after_cursor = orders.last["cursor"]
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  all_orders
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                def process_orders(orders)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  active_order_ids = []
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

            
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  orders.each do |order_data|
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                      # Use the new enhanced order processing service with idempotency
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                      result = OrderProcessingService.process_order_with_idempotency(
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                        order_data,
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                        "shopify",
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                        @shop
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                      )
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                      if result[:success]
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.info "Successfully processed Shopify order #{extract_id_from_gid(order_data['id'])}"
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                        active_order_ids << result[:order].id
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                      else
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.warn "Shopify order #{extract_id_from_gid(order_data['id'])} processed with errors: #{result[:errors].join(', ')}"
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                      end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                    rescue OrderProcessingService::OrderProcessingError => e
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "Failed to process Shopify order #{extract_id_from_gid(order_data['id'])}: #{e.message}"
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                    rescue => e
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "Unexpected error processing Shopify order #{extract_id_from_gid(order_data['id'])}: #{e.message}"
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    end
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                # Legacy methods - now handled by OrderProcessingService
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                # Keeping these as private methods for potential single order updates
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                private
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                def extract_shipping_address(address)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  return {} unless address
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  {
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                    name: address["name"],
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                    street1: address["address1"],
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                    street2: address["address2"],
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    city: address["city"],
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                    state: address["province"],
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                    postal_code: address["zip"],
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                    country: address["countryCode"],
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                    phone: address["phone"]
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  }
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                def extract_customer_name(customer)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  if customer
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    "#{customer['firstName']} #{customer['lastName']}".strip
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  else
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                    "Unknown Customer"
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                def orders_query
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  <<~GQL
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                    query($first: Int!, $after: String, $query: String) {
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                      orders(first: $first, after: $after, query: $query) {
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                        edges {
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                          cursor
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                          node {
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                            id
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                            createdAt
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                            processedAt
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                            cancelledAt
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                            displayFulfillmentStatus
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                            displayFinancialStatus
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                            subtotalPriceSet {
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                              shopMoney {
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                                amount
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                              }
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                            }
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                            totalPriceSet {
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                              shopMoney {
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                                amount
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                              }
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                            }
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                            totalShippingPriceSet {
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                              shopMoney {
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                                amount
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                              }
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                            }
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                            lineItems(first: 50) {
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                              edges {
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                                node {
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                                  id
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                                  title
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                                  quantity
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                                  product {
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                                    id
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                                  }
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                                  variant {
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                                    id
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                                  }
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                                }
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                              }
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                            }
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                          }
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                        }
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                        pageInfo {
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                          hasNextPage
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                        }
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                      }
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                    }
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                  GQL
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                def extract_id_from_gid(gid)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                  return nil if gid.blank?
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                  gid.split("/").last
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Failed to extract ID from GID: #{gid}"
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

            
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                def should_check_older_orders?
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  last_check = Rails.cache.read(older_orders_cache_key)
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                  last_check.nil? || last_check < OLDER_ORDERS_CHECK_INTERVAL.ago
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                end
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                def older_orders_cache_key
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                  "shopify_older_orders_last_check:#{@shop.id}"
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                def process_older_unfulfilled_orders
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                  unfulfilled_orders = @shop.orders
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                                           .where(platform: "shopify")
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                                           .where.not(status: [ "completed", "cancelled" ])
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                                           .where("created_at > ?", EXTENDED_WINDOW.ago)
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

            
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                  unfulfilled_orders.find_each do |order|
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                    update_single_order(order)
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                  end
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

            
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                  Rails.cache.write(older_orders_cache_key, Time.current, expires_in: OLDER_ORDERS_CHECK_INTERVAL)
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Processed older unfulfilled orders for shop #{@shop.id}"
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                end
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

            
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                def update_single_order(order)
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                  response = @client.query(
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                    query: single_order_query,
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                    variables: { id: "gid://shopify/Order/#{order.platform_order_id}" }
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                  )
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                  if response.body["data"] && response.body["data"]["order"]
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                    order_data = response.body["data"]["order"]
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

            
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                    # Use the enhanced order processing service
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                    OrderProcessingService.process_order_with_idempotency(
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                      order_data,
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                      "shopify",
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                      @shop
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                    )
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                  end
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Failed to update order #{order.platform_order_id}: #{e.message}"
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                end
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242.

    app/jobs/shopify/update_product_inventory_job.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    17 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 17 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            module Shopify
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              class UpdateProductInventoryJob < ApplicationJob
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                queue_as :default
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                def perform(shop_id, shopify_product_id, kuralis_product_id)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  shop = Shop.find(shop_id)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  shopify_product = shop.shopify_products.find(shopify_product_id)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  kuralis_product = shop.kuralis_products.find(kuralis_product_id)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  # Use the InventoryService to handle the update/end logic
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  inventory_service = Shopify::InventoryService.new(shopify_product, kuralis_product)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  result = inventory_service.update_inventory
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  if result
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Successfully processed Shopify product #{shopify_product.id} update"
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  else
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Failed to process Shopify product #{shopify_product.id} update"
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            end
          
      22.

    app/mailers/application_mailer.rb

    0.0% lines covered

            class ApplicationMailer < ActionMailer::Base

    app/models/ai_product_analysis.rb

            class AiProductAnalysis < ApplicationRecord
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              belongs_to :shop
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              has_one_attached :image_attachment
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              has_one :kuralis_product, dependent: :nullify
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # Validations
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              validates :image, presence: true
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              validates :status, presence: true, inclusion: { in: %w[pending processing completed failed] }
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              # Scopes
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              scope :pending, -> { where(status: "pending") }
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              scope :processing, -> { where(status: "processing") }
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              scope :completed, -> { where(status: "completed") }
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              scope :failed, -> { where(status: "failed") }
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              scope :unprocessed, -> { where(processed: false) }
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              scope :processed, -> { where(processed: true) }
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              scope :recent, -> { order(created_at: :desc) }
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              scope :ready_for_products, -> { completed.unprocessed }
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              scope :with_draft_product, -> { joins(:kuralis_product).where(kuralis_products: { is_draft: true }) }
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              scope :without_draft_product, -> {
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                left_joins(:kuralis_product)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  .where("kuralis_products.id IS NULL OR kuralis_products.is_draft = ?", false)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              }
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              scope :high_confidence, -> { completed.where("results->>'ebay_category_confidence' > '0.8'") }
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              scope :low_confidence, -> { completed.where("results->>'ebay_category_confidence' < '0.5'") }
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              scope :needs_review, -> { completed.where("results->>'requires_category_review' = 'true' OR results->>'requires_specifics_review' = 'true'") }
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              # Virtual attribute for error message
          
      29.

              attr_accessor :error_message

    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              # Methods

              def pending?
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                status == "pending"
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34.

      35.

              def processing?
          
      37.

                status == "processing"

      39.

              def completed?
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                status == "completed"
          
      42.

              def failed?
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                status == "failed"
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              def has_draft_product?
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                # Check if there's an associated kuralis_product that is a draft
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                kuralis_product.present? && kuralis_product.draft?
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                # Log any errors and return false
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Error checking for draft product: #{e.message}"
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                false
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              def mark_as_processing!
          
      58.

    59.

              def mark_as_completed!(results_data)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                update!(
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  status: "completed",
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  results: results_data,
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  processed: false
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                )
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

              end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

              def mark_as_failed!(error_message)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                update!(

    71. 
            

            

                  status: "failed",
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72.

      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  processed: false
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74.

      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                self.error_message = error_message
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

              end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77.

              def mark_as_processed!
          
      79.

                update!(processed: true)

    80. 
            

            

              end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

            
          
      82.

              # Returns a human-readable status message
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

              def status_message
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                case status
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                when "pending"
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  "Waiting to be analyzed..."
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                when "processing"
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  "AI is analyzing this image..."
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                when "completed"
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  "Analysis complete"
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                when "failed"
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  error_message || "Analysis failed"
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                else
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  status
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                end

              end

              # Returns a status class for styling

              def confidence_notes
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                results&.dig("confidence_notes") || {}

              end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186.

              def overall_confidence_level
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                # Calculate overall confidence based on all available confidence scores
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                confidences = confidence_notes.values.compact
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                return "unknown" if confidences.empty?
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                avg_confidence = confidences.sum / confidences.length
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                case avg_confidence
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                when 0.8..1.0
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  "high"
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                when 0.6..0.8
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  "medium"
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                else
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                  "low"
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

              end
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

            
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

              def missing_required_specifics

              def category_confidence_level

                confidence = suggested_category_confidence

                confidence = suggested_item_specifics_confidence

              def error_message

              # Create a draft product from this analysis
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

              def create_draft_product_from_analysis
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                # Check if a draft product already exists for this analysis
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                existing_draft = KuralisProduct.find_by(ai_product_analysis_id: id, is_draft: true)
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                if existing_draft.present?
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Draft product already exists for analysis #{id}"
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                  return existing_draft
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                end
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

            
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                # Create the draft product using the existing method
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                draft_product = KuralisProduct.create_from_ai_analysis(self, shop)
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

            
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                if draft_product.persisted?
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Successfully created draft product #{draft_product.id} from analysis #{id}"
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                else
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Failed to create draft product from analysis #{id}: #{draft_product.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                end
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

            
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                draft_product
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Error creating draft product from analysis #{id}: #{e.message}"
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                nil
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

              end
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

            end
          
      269.

            require 'set'
