                if attrs.payment_profile_id.blank?
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  default_payment = shop.get_setting(KuralisShopSetting::CATEGORIES[:ebay], "default_payment_policy")
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  errors << "Payment policy is required" if default_payment.blank?
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                # Check return policy
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                if attrs.return_profile_id.blank?
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  default_return = shop.get_setting(KuralisShopSetting::CATEGORIES[:ebay], "default_return_policy")
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  errors << "Return policy is required" if default_return.blank?
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                # Check for attached images
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                errors << "At least one product image is required" unless images.attached?
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                errors
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

              end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

              # Check if product can be listed on eBay
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

              def can_list_on_ebay?
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                validate_for_ebay_listing.empty?
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

              end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

              # Draft methods
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

              def draft?
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                is_draft
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

              end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

              def finalized?
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                !is_draft
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

            
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

              def finalize!
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                self.is_draft = false
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                if valid?
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                  save!
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                else
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  raise ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid.new(self)
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                end
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

              end
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

              # Check if draft can be finalized (has all required fields)
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

              def can_finalize?
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                return true unless is_draft?
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                # Temporarily set is_draft to false to check if it would be valid
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                original_draft_status = is_draft
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                self.is_draft = false
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                is_valid = valid?
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                self.is_draft = original_draft_status
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                is_valid
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

              end
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

            
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

              # Get list of missing fields preventing finalization
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

              def missing_fields_for_finalization
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                return [] unless is_draft?
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                missing = []
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                missing << "price" if base_price.blank?
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                missing << "description" if description.blank? || description == "Product description to be added"
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                missing << "title" if title.blank? || title == "Untitled Product"
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

            
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                missing
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

              end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

              # Create a draft product from AI analysis
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

              def self.create_from_ai_analysis(analysis, shop)
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                draft_product = shop.kuralis_products.new(
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                  title: analysis.suggested_title.presence || "Untitled Product",
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                  description: analysis.suggested_description.presence || "Product description to be added",
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                  base_price: nil, # Price will be set by user during finalization
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                  base_quantity: 1, # Default to 1 for draft products
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                  brand: analysis.suggested_brand,
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                  condition: analysis.suggested_condition,
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                  tags: analysis.suggested_tags,
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                  status: "active",
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                  source_platform: "ai",
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                  is_draft: true,
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                  ai_product_analysis_id: analysis.id
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                )
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

            
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                # Attach the image from the analysis
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                if analysis.image_attachment.attached?
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                  draft_product.images.attach(analysis.image_attachment.blob)
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                end
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

            
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                # Save the draft product first - without validating ebay_product_attributes
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                if draft_product.save
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                  p "Draft product saved"
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                  # Now that the product is saved with an ID, create eBay product attributes if available
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                  if analysis.suggested_ebay_category.present?
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                    p "Creating eBay product attribute"
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

            
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                    # Get default values from shop settings
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                    default_condition = shop.get_setting(KuralisShopSetting::CATEGORIES[:ebay], "default_condition")
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                    default_duration = shop.get_setting(KuralisShopSetting::CATEGORIES[:ebay], "default_duration")
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                    default_shipping = shop.get_setting(KuralisShopSetting::CATEGORIES[:ebay], "default_shipping_policy")
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                    default_payment = shop.get_setting(KuralisShopSetting::CATEGORIES[:ebay], "default_payment_policy")
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                    default_return = shop.get_setting(KuralisShopSetting::CATEGORIES[:ebay], "default_return_policy")
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

            
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                    # Create eBay product attribute directly with defaults applied
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                    ebay_attr = EbayProductAttribute.create(
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                      kuralis_product_id: draft_product.id,
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                      category_id: analysis.suggested_ebay_category,
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                      condition_id: default_condition,
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                      listing_duration: default_duration,
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                      shipping_profile_id: default_shipping,
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                      payment_profile_id: default_payment,
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                      return_profile_id: default_return,
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                      best_offer_enabled: true # Default to enabled
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                    )
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

            
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                    # Get all item specifics for the category
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                    category_specifics = ebay_attr.find_or_initialize_item_specifics(shop)
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

            
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                    # Map AI values to the category specifics
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                    mapped_specifics = Ai::ItemSpecificsMapper.map_to_ebay_format(
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                      analysis.suggested_item_specifics,
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                      category_specifics
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                    )
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

            
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                    # Create a complete hash of all category specifics, with mapped values or empty strings
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                    all_specifics = category_specifics.each_with_object({}) do |aspect, hash|
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                      hash[aspect["name"]] = mapped_specifics[aspect["name"]] || ""
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                    end
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

            
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                    # Update the eBay attribute with all specifics
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                    ebay_attr.update(item_specifics: all_specifics)
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

            
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                    # If the eBay attribute can't be saved, log the error but continue
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                    unless ebay_attr.persisted?
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "Failed to save eBay attributes: #{ebay_attr.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                    end
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                  end
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

            
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                  # Mark the analysis as processed
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                  analysis.mark_as_processed!
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                end
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

            
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                draft_product
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

              end
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

            
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

              # Add image caching method
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

              def cache_images
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

                return if image_urls.blank?
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

            
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                image_urls.each do |url|
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

                    images.attach(io: URI.open(url), filename: File.basename(url))
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Failed to cache image from #{url}: #{e.message}"
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

                  end
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

                end
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

            
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

                update(images_last_synced_at: Time.current)
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

              end
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

            
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

              # Returns a processed image variant that meets eBay's requirements
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

              def prepare_image_for_ebay(image)
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

                image.variant(
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

                  resize_to_limit: [ 1600, 1600 ],    # Larger size for eBay
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

                  format: :jpg,                     # JPEG format for compatibility
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

                  saver: {
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

                    strip: true,                    # Remove metadata
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

                    quality: 90                     # Higher quality for eBay requirement
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

                  }
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            

                ).processed
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

              end
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            

            
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            

              def web_optimized_image_url(image)
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            

                variant = image.variant(
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            

                  resize_to_limit: [ 1200, 1200 ],
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            

                  format: :webp,
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            

                  saver: { quality: 80, strip: true }
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            

                ).processed
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            

            
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            

                Rails.application.routes.url_helpers.url_for(variant)
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            

              end
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            

            
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            

              def ebay_optimized_image_url(image)
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            

                variant = image.variant(
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            

                  resize_to_limit: [ 1600, 1600 ],
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            

                  format: :jpg,
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            

                  saver: { quality: 90, strip: true }
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            

                ).processed
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            

            
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            

                Rails.application.routes.url_helpers.url_for(variant)
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            

              end
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            

            

            
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            

              def ebay_compatible_image_urls
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            

                return [] unless images.attached?
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            

            
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            

                images.map do |image|
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            

                  ebay_optimized_image_url(image)
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            

                end
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            

              end
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            

            
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            

              private
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            

            
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            

              def schedule_platform_updates
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            

                # Only update platforms when relevant attributes have changed
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            

            

                return unless should_update_platforms?
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            

            

            
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Scheduling platform updates for #{id}"
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            

            

            
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.warn "TODO: Implement platform updates in schedule_platform_updates"
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            

            

                nil
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            

            

              end
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            

            

            
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            

            

              def schedule_inventory_sync
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            

            

                # Only schedule inventory sync if inventory_sync is enabled
          
      355. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    355. 
            

            

                return unless inventory_sync?
          
      356. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    356. 
            

            

            
          
      357. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    357. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Inventory change detected for product_id=#{id}"
          
      358. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    358. 
            

            

            
          
      359. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    359. 
            

            

                # Record the timestamp of this inventory update
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360. 
            

            

                self.update_column(:last_inventory_update, Time.current)
          
      361. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    361. 
            

            

            
          
      362. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    362. 
            

            

                # Schedule the new cross-platform sync job (no skip platform)
          
      363. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    363. 
            

            

                CrossPlatformInventorySyncJob.set(wait: 5.seconds).perform_later(shop.id, id, nil)
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            

            

              end
          
      365. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    365. 
            

            

            
          
      366. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    366. 
            

            

              # TODO: We need to possibly look at changes to ebay_product_attribute and shopify_product_attributes
          
      367. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    367. 
            

            

              def should_update_platforms?
          
      368. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    368. 
            

            

                # Attributes that should trigger platform updates when changed
          
      369. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    369. 
            

            

                relevant_attributes = [

                def get_setting(shop, category, key)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  setting = find_by(shop: shop, category: category, key: key)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  # TODO: Should we just return a default false if the setting is not found?
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  return nil unless setting
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  if BOOLEAN_SETTINGS.include?(key)

    36.

      37.

                def set_setting(shop, category, key, value)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  setting = find_or_initialize_by(shop: shop, category: category, key: key)

      47.

                # Batch get settings by category
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                def get_category_settings(shop, category)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  where(shop: shop, category: category).each_with_object({}) do |setting, hash|
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    hash[setting.key] = BOOLEAN_SETTINGS.include?(setting.key) ? setting.boolean_value : setting.value
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56.

    57. 
            

            

              def boolean_value
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                return false if value.nil?
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                ActiveModel::Type::Boolean.new.cast(value)

    60. 
            

            

              end
          
      61.

                def base_query

    17. 
            

            

                  shop.orders
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                      .includes(:order_items)

    19.

      21.

                def apply_filters(query)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  case tab
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  when 'pending'
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    query.where(status: 'pending')
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  when 'paid'
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    query.where(status: 'completed', payment_status: 'paid')
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  when 'shipped'
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    query.where(status: 'shipped')
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  when 'completed'
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    query.where(status: 'completed')
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  else
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    query
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            end

              def inventory_summary
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                products = kuralis_products.active
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                {
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71.

              def platform_sync_status

                total_products = kuralis_products.active.count

                return { shopify: 0, ebay: 0 } if total_products.zero?
          
      81.

      82.

              def category_tag(category_id)

              def set_category_tag(category_id, tag)

    47. 
            

            

                save

              def remove_category_tag(category_id)

    51. 
            

            

                self.category_tag_mappings = category_tag_mappings.except(category_id)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                save

              end

              def tags_for_listing(ebay_listing)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                tags = []
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                tags << category_tag(ebay_listing.store_category_id) if ebay_listing.store_category_id.present?
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                tags.compact
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

              end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            end
          
      61.

            module Ai
          
      2.

              class EbayCategoryEmbeddingService
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                # Using JSON storage for embeddings since pgvector is not available
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                # Generate embeddings for all eBay categories
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                def self.generate_embeddings_for_all_categories
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  # Process in batches to avoid memory issues
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  EbayCategory.find_each(batch_size: 100) do |category|
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                    generate_embedding_for_category(category)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  end
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                end
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                # Generate embedding for a single category
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                def self.generate_embedding_for_category(category)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  # Skip if already has embedding and hasn't changed
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  return if category.embedding_json.present? && !category.updated_at_changed?
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  # Get embedding from OpenAI
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  embedding = get_embedding_for_text("#{category.name}: #{category.full_path}")
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  # Save the embedding to JSON column
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  category.update(embedding_json: embedding)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error generating embedding for category #{category.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                # Find semantically similar categories to the given text
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                def self.find_similar_categories(text, limit: 10)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  # Get embedding for the search text
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  query_embedding = get_embedding_for_text(text)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  # Using manual cosine similarity calculation
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  categories_with_embeddings = EbayCategory.where.not(embedding_json: nil).to_a
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  # Calculate similarity scores
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  categories_with_scores = categories_with_embeddings.map do |category|
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    category_embedding = category.embedding_json
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    score = calculate_cosine_similarity(query_embedding, category_embedding)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    [category, score]
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  # Sort by similarity score (descending) and take the top N
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  categories_with_scores.sort_by { |_, score| -score }.take(limit).map(&:first)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error finding similar categories: #{e.message}"
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  # Fallback to keyword search
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  EbayCategory.search_by_name(text).limit(limit)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                # Find the most semantically similar category to the given text
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                def self.find_most_similar_category(text)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  find_similar_categories(text, limit: 1).first
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error finding most similar category: #{e.message}"
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                private
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                # Get embedding from OpenAI for the given text
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                def self.get_embedding_for_text(text)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  # Initialize OpenAI client
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  client = OpenAI::Client.new(access_token: ENV['OPENAI_API_KEY'])
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  # Call embedding API
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  response = client.embeddings(
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    parameters: {
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                      model: "text-embedding-ada-002",
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                      input: text
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    }
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  )
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  # Extract the embedding vector
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  response.dig("data", 0, "embedding")
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                # Calculate cosine similarity between two embedding vectors
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                def self.calculate_cosine_similarity(vec1, vec2)
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  # Ensure we have arrays
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  return 0 unless vec1.is_a?(Array) && vec2.is_a?(Array)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  return 0 unless vec1.length == vec2.length
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  # Calculate dot product
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  dot_product = 0
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  vec1.each_with_index do |v1, i|
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                    dot_product += v1 * vec2[i]
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  end
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  # Calculate magnitudes
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  mag1 = Math.sqrt(vec1.map { |v| v * v }.sum)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  mag2 = Math.sqrt(vec2.map { |v| v * v }.sum)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  # Calculate cosine similarity
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  dot_product / (mag1 * mag2)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

              end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

            end 
          
      98.

    app/services/ai/ebay_category_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    170 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 170 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            module Ai
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              class EbayCategoryService
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                # Maximum number of categories to include in context
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                DEFAULT_CATEGORY_LIMIT = 5
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                # Retrieve top eBay categories for AI context
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                # This provides a curated list of categories to include in the OpenAI prompt
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                def self.get_categories_for_ai_context(limit: DEFAULT_CATEGORY_LIMIT, query: nil)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  categories = if query.present?
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                    # If embeddings are available, try semantic search first
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                    if embeddings_available? && EbayCategory.where.not(embedding_json: nil).exists?
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                      # Use semantic search
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                      Ai::EbayCategoryEmbeddingService.find_similar_categories(query, limit: limit)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    else
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                      # Fall back to text search
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                      EbayCategory.search_by_name(query).limit(limit)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  else
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    # Otherwise, get popular leaf categories
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    EbayCategory.leaves.order(id: :desc).limit(limit)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  # Format the categories for inclusion in the prompt
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  format_categories_for_prompt(categories)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                # Format categories in a structured way for the AI prompt
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                def self.format_categories_for_prompt(categories)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  categories.map do |category|
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    {
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                      "category_id" => category.category_id,
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                      "name" => category.name,
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                      "full_path" => category.full_path,
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                      "is_leaf" => category.leaf
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    }
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                # Optimized method to find the best matching eBay category using multiple strategies
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                def self.find_matching_ebay_category(category_path_or_description)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  return nil if category_path_or_description.blank?
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  # Check cache first for performance
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  cache_key = "ebay_category_match:#{Digest::MD5.hexdigest(category_path_or_description.downcase)}"
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  cached_result = Rails.cache.read(cache_key)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  if cached_result
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Found cached category match: #{cached_result['name']} (#{cached_result['category_id']})"
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    return EbayCategory.find_by(category_id: cached_result["category_id"], marketplace_id: "EBAY_US")
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Finding matching eBay category for: #{category_path_or_description}"
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  # Strategy 1: Exact path matching (highest priority)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  match = find_by_exact_path(category_path_or_description)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  if match
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Found exact path match: #{match.name} (#{match.category_id})"
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    cache_category_match(cache_key, match)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    return match
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  # Strategy 2: Semantic search using embeddings (if available)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  if embeddings_available? && EbayCategory.where.not(embedding_json: nil).exists?
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    match = Ai::EbayCategoryEmbeddingService.find_most_similar_category(category_path_or_description)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    if match && match.leaf? # Only accept leaf categories from semantic search
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info "Found match by semantic similarity: #{match.name} (#{match.category_id})"
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                      cache_category_match(cache_key, match)
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                      return match
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  # Strategy 3: Intelligent leaf name matching with context
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  match = find_by_leaf_name_with_context(category_path_or_description)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  if match
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Found match by leaf name with context: #{match.name} (#{match.category_id})"
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    cache_category_match(cache_key, match)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    return match
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  # Strategy 4: Broader category matching (fallback to parent categories)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  match = find_broader_category_match(category_path_or_description)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  if match
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Found broader category match: #{match.name} (#{match.category_id})"
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    cache_category_match(cache_key, match)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                    return match
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "No matching category found for: #{category_path_or_description}"
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  # Cache negative results too (for 5 minutes)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  Rails.cache.write(cache_key, nil, expires_in: 5.minutes)
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                # Cache successful category matches
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                def self.cache_category_match(cache_key, category)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  Rails.cache.write(cache_key, {
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                    "category_id" => category.category_id,
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                    "name" => category.name,
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                    "full_path" => category.full_path
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  }, expires_in: 1.hour)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                # Find exact path matches
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                def self.find_by_exact_path(path)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  normalized_path = normalize_text_for_matching(path)
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  # Try to find categories where the full path matches exactly
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  EbayCategory.where(leaf: true).find do |category|
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    category_path = normalize_text_for_matching(category.full_path)
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    category_path == normalized_path
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                # Enhanced leaf name matching with better context awareness
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                def self.find_by_leaf_name_with_context(path)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  segments = path.split(/\s*[>\/]\s*/)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  return nil if segments.empty?
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  leaf_name = segments.last.strip
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  parent_context = segments.size > 1 ? segments[-2..-1] : []
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

            
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  # Normalize for matching
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  normalized_leaf = normalize_text_for_matching(leaf_name)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  # Get potential matches
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  potential_matches = EbayCategory.where("LOWER(REPLACE(REPLACE(name, '''', ''), '&', 'and')) LIKE LOWER(REPLACE(REPLACE(?, '''', ''), '&', 'and'))", "%#{leaf_name}%")
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                                                 .where(leaf: true)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                                                 .to_a
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  # Score matches based on context
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  scored_matches = potential_matches.map do |category|
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    score = calculate_context_score(category, segments)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                    [ category, score ]
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  end
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  # Return the highest scoring match if it's above threshold
