      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  best_match = scored_matches.max_by { |_, score| score }
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  return best_match[0] if best_match && best_match[1] > 0.3
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                # Find broader category matches when specific ones fail
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                def self.find_broader_category_match(path)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  segments = path.split(/\s*[>\/]\s*/)
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  return nil if segments.size < 2
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

            
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  # Try matching against broader categories (parents)
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  (segments.size - 1).downto(1) do |i|
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    broader_path = segments[0..i].join(" > ")
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                    # Look for categories that contain these broader terms
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                    segments[0..i].each do |segment|
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                      normalized_segment = normalize_text_for_matching(segment)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                      next if normalized_segment.length < 4 # Skip very short terms
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                      category = EbayCategory.where("LOWER(REPLACE(REPLACE(name, '''', ''), '&', 'and')) LIKE LOWER(REPLACE(REPLACE(?, '''', ''), '&', 'and'))", "%#{segment}%")
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                                            .where(leaf: true)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                                            .first
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                      return category if category
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

            
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                # Calculate context score for category matching
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                def self.calculate_context_score(category, path_segments)
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  return 0 unless category.full_path.present?
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

            
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  category_segments = category.full_path.split(/\s*>\s*/).map { |s| normalize_text_for_matching(s) }
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  path_segments_normalized = path_segments.map { |s| normalize_text_for_matching(s) }
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  # Count matching segments
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  matching_segments = 0
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  path_segments_normalized.each do |path_segment|
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                    if category_segments.any? { |cat_segment| cat_segment.include?(path_segment) || path_segment.include?(cat_segment) }
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                      matching_segments += 1
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                    end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                  end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  # Calculate score (percentage of path segments that match)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  matching_segments.to_f / path_segments.size
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                end
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                # Fast method to find by leaf name (legacy - keeping for backward compatibility)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                def self.find_by_leaf_name(path)
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                  find_by_leaf_name_with_context(path)
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                # Legacy method for backward compatibility
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                def self.find_best_matching_category(category_path_or_description)
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  find_matching_ebay_category(category_path_or_description)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                # Normalize text for better matching
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                def self.normalize_text_for_matching(text)
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  return "" if text.blank?
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

            
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                  # Remove apostrophes, standardize ampersands, lowercase
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  normalized = text.downcase
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                                  .gsub(/['']/, "")   # Remove apostrophes
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                                  .gsub(/&/, "and")    # Convert & to 'and'
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                                  .gsub(/\bwomens\b/, "women")  # Normalize womens to women
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                                  .gsub(/\bmens\b/, "men")      # Normalize mens to men
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                                  .gsub(/[-_]/, " ")   # Convert hyphens and underscores to spaces
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                                  .strip
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

            
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                  normalized
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                end
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

            
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                # Generate a system prompt for eBay category awareness
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                def self.generate_ebay_category_prompt
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                  <<~PROMPT
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                    You are a product analysis expert for eBay. Provide accurate eBay category paths for products.
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

            
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                    Use standard eBay category paths with the full hierarchy, separated by " > " between levels.
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                    Be specific and accurate. Use only real eBay categories.
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

            
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                    Important format notes:
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                    - Use apostrophes for possessives (e.g., "Women's Bags" not "Womens Bags")
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                    - Include "accessories" when appropriate
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                    - Use "&" for "and" in category names
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  PROMPT
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                end
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

            
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                private
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

            
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                # Check if embeddings functionality is available
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                def self.embeddings_available?
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                  defined?(Ai::EbayCategoryEmbeddingService) &&
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                  Ai::EbayCategoryEmbeddingService.respond_to?(:find_similar_categories)
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                end
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

            
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                # Format the categories as plain text for inclusion in the prompt
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                def self.format_categories_as_text(categories)
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                  categories.map do |category|
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                    "- #{category['name']} (#{category['full_path']}) - ID: #{category['category_id']}"
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                  end.join("\n")
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                end
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

            
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                # Extract potential keywords from a product title
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                def self.extract_keywords_from_title(title)
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                  return "" if title.blank?
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

            
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                  # Extract nouns and meaningful terms - basic implementation
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                  # In a production environment, consider using NLP for better extraction
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                  words = title.split(/\s+/).uniq
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

            
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                  # Filter out common stopwords and short words
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                  stopwords = %w[the and a an of to in for on with by at from]
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                  keywords = words.reject { |word| word.length < 4 || stopwords.include?(word.downcase) }
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

            
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                  # Join the top keywords for the search
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                  keywords.first(5).join(" ")
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                end
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

              end
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

            end
          
      258.

    app/services/ai/item_specifics_mapper.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    104 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 104 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # app/services/ai/item_specifics_mapper.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            module Ai
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                class ItemSpecificsMapper
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                  # Maps AI-detected item specifics to eBay category-specific item specifics
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                  #
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  # @param ai_item_specifics [Hash] Item specifics detected by AI
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  # @param ebay_aspect_metadata [Array] Aspect metadata from eBay taxonomy API
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  # @return [Hash] Mapped item specifics in the format eBay expects
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  def self.map_to_ebay_format(ai_item_specifics, ebay_aspect_metadata)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                    mapped_specifics = {}
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                    # Initialize required fields with empty values
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                    ebay_aspect_metadata.each do |aspect|
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                      if aspect["required"]
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                        mapped_specifics[aspect["name"]] = ""
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                      end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    # Try to map AI attributes to eBay aspects
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    ai_item_specifics.each do |ai_key, ai_value|
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                      next if ai_value.blank?
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                      # Try exact match first
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                      exact_match = find_exact_match(ai_key, ebay_aspect_metadata)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                      if exact_match
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                        mapped_specifics[exact_match["name"]] = format_value(ai_value, exact_match)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                        next
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                      end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                      # Try fuzzy match if no exact match found
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                      fuzzy_match = find_fuzzy_match(ai_key, ai_value, ebay_aspect_metadata)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                      if fuzzy_match
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                        mapped_specifics[fuzzy_match["name"]] = format_value(ai_value, fuzzy_match)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                      end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    mapped_specifics
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  private
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  def self.find_exact_match(ai_key, ebay_aspects)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    ebay_aspects.find { |aspect| aspect["name"].downcase == ai_key.downcase }
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  def self.find_fuzzy_match(ai_key, ai_value, ebay_aspects)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                    # Try different matching strategies
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    # 1. Check if AI key is contained in or contains eBay aspect name
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    ebay_aspects.each do |aspect|
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                      return aspect if aspect["name"].downcase.include?(ai_key.downcase) ||
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                                         ai_key.downcase.include?(aspect["name"].downcase)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    # 2. Check for word-level matches
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    ai_words = ai_key.downcase.split(/\W+/)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    ebay_aspects.each do |aspect|
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                      aspect_words = aspect["name"].downcase.split(/\W+/)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                      common_words = ai_words & aspect_words
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                      # If at least half of the words match (of whichever is shorter)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                      if common_words.any? && common_words.length >= [ ai_words.length, aspect_words.length ].min * 0.5
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                        return aspect
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    # 3. Check if AI value matches any recommended values
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    ebay_aspects.each do |aspect|
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                      next unless aspect["values"].present?
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                      aspect["values"].each do |value|
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                        if value.downcase.include?(ai_value.to_s.downcase) ||
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                           ai_value.to_s.downcase.include?(value.downcase)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                          return aspect
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                        end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                      end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    nil
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  def self.format_value(ai_value, aspect)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                    # Format the value based on aspect constraints and value_type
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    if aspect["values"].present?
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                      value_type = aspect["value_type"]
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                      # For "select" type fields, we must use one of the provided values
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                      if value_type == "select"
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                        best_match = find_best_matching_value(ai_value.to_s, aspect["values"])
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                        return best_match || "" # Return empty string if no match found for required select fields
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                      # For "text_with_suggestions" type fields, use the AI value directly
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                      elsif value_type == "text_with_suggestions"
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                        return ai_value.to_s.strip
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                      end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                      # For other field types, try the previous simple matching logic for backward compatibility
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                      aspect["values"].each do |value|
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                        return value if value.downcase.include?(ai_value.to_s.downcase) ||
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                                       ai_value.to_s.downcase.include?(value.downcase)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                      end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    # If no matching recommended value or for free text fields, return original with basic formatting
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                    ai_value.to_s.strip
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  end
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  # Find the best matching value from a list of allowed values
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  # Returns nil if no good match is found
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  def self.find_best_matching_value(ai_value, allowed_values)
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                    ai_value = ai_value.to_s.strip.downcase
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                    # 1. Try exact match (case insensitive)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                    exact_match = allowed_values.find { |v| v.downcase == ai_value }
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                    return exact_match if exact_match
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                    # 2. Try numeric match for years and other numeric values
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                    if ai_value =~ /^\d+$/
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                      # If AI value is a number, try to find closest match
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                      numeric_ai_value = ai_value.to_i
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                      numeric_values = allowed_values.select { |v| v =~ /^\d+$/ }.map { |v| v.to_i }
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                      if numeric_values.any?
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                        # Find exact numeric match
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                        exact_numeric_match = allowed_values.find { |v| v.to_i == numeric_ai_value }
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                        return exact_numeric_match if exact_numeric_match
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                        # Find closest year (for publication years, etc.)
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                        closest_value = numeric_values.min_by { |v| (v - numeric_ai_value).abs }
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                        closest_value_diff = (closest_value - numeric_ai_value).abs
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                        # If within reasonable range (e.g., 5 years), use it
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                        if closest_value_diff <= 5
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                          return allowed_values.find { |v| v.to_i == closest_value }
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                        end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                      end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                    end
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

            
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                    # 3. Try contained match (one contains the other)
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                    contained_match = allowed_values.find do |v|
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                      v.downcase.include?(ai_value) || ai_value.include?(v.downcase)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                    end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                    return contained_match if contained_match
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                    # 4. Try word similarity
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                    ai_words = ai_value.split(/\W+/)
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    best_match = nil
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                    highest_similarity = 0
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                    allowed_values.each do |value|
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                      value_words = value.downcase.split(/\W+/)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                      common_words = ai_words & value_words
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                      # Calculate similarity as percentage of matching words
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                      similarity = common_words.length.to_f / [ ai_words.length, value_words.length ].max
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                      if similarity > highest_similarity && similarity >= 0.3 # At least 30% similar
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                        highest_similarity = similarity
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                        best_match = value
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                      end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                    end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                    best_match
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

            end
          
      169.

    app/services/ai/openai_service.rb

              class OpenaiService

                attr_reader :client

                DEFAULT_MODEL = "gpt-4o"

                def initialize(model: DEFAULT_MODEL, temperature: DEFAULT_TEMPERATURE, max_tokens: DEFAULT_MAX_TOKENS)

      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17.

                # Send a simple chat request with a single user message
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                def chat(message, system_prompt: nil)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  messages = []
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  # Add system message if provided
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  if system_prompt.present?
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    messages << { role: "system", content: system_prompt }
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  # Add user message
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  messages << { role: "user", content: message }
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  # Send request to OpenAI
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  response = client.chat(
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    parameters: {
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                      model: @model,
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                      messages: messages,
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                      temperature: @temperature,
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                      max_tokens: @max_tokens
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    }
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  )
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  # Extract and return the assistant's response
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  if response["choices"] && response["choices"].first && response["choices"].first["message"]
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    return response["choices"].first["message"]["content"]
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  else
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "OpenAI API Error: #{response.inspect}"
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    raise "Failed to get response from OpenAI"
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                # Send a chat request with a conversation history
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                def chat_with_history(messages)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  # Validate messages format
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  unless messages.is_a?(Array) && messages.all? { |m| m.key?(:role) && m.key?(:content) }
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    raise ArgumentError, "Messages must be an array of hashes with :role and :content keys"
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  # Send request to OpenAI
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  response = client.chat(
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    parameters: {
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                      model: @model,
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60.

      61.

      63.

                    }
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  )
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  # Extract and return the assistant's response
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  if response["choices"] && response["choices"].first && response["choices"].first["message"]
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    return {
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                      content: response["choices"].first["message"]["content"],
          
      70.

      71.

      72.

      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  else
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "OpenAI API Error: #{response.inspect}"
          
      75.

                    raise "Failed to get response from OpenAI"
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                end

              end

            end

                def initialize(ebay_account, marketplace_id = 'EBAY_US')

                  @ebay_account = ebay_account

                  @token_service = EbayTokenService.new(@shop)

      11.

                def import_categories
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Starting eBay category import for marketplace #{marketplace_id}"
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    # Fetch categories from eBay API
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    categories = fetch_categories_from_api
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    # Process and save categories
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    process_categories(categories)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Successfully imported #{categories.size} eBay categories"
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    { success: true, count: categories.size }
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Error importing eBay categories: #{e.message}"
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    { success: false, error: e.message }
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                private
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                def fetch_categories_from_api
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  token = @token_service.fetch_or_refresh_access_token
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  uri = URI('https://api.ebay.com/ws/api.dll')
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  headers = {
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    'X-EBAY-API-COMPATIBILITY-LEVEL' => '967',
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    'X-EBAY-API-IAF-TOKEN' => token,
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    'X-EBAY-API-CALL-NAME' => 'GetCategories',
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    'X-EBAY-API-SITEID' => '0', # US site ID
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    'Content-Type' => 'text/xml'
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  }
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  xml_request = build_get_categories_request
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  response = Net::HTTP.start(uri.host, uri.port, use_ssl: true) do |http|
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri, headers)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    request.body = xml_request
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    http.request(request)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  if response.is_a?(Net::HTTPSuccess)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    doc = Nokogiri::XML(response.body)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    namespace = { "ebay" => "urn:ebay:apis:eBLBaseComponents" }
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    category_count = doc.xpath('//ebay:CategoryCount', namespace).text.to_i
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Fetched #{category_count} categories from eBay API"
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    parse_categories(doc, namespace)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  else
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Failed to fetch categories: #{response.body}"
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    raise "HTTP #{response.code}: #{response.body}"
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                def build_get_categories_request
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  <<~XML
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    <GetCategoriesRequest xmlns="urn:ebay:apis:eBLBaseComponents">
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                      <RequesterCredentials>
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                        <eBayAuthToken>#{@token_service.fetch_or_refresh_access_token}</eBayAuthToken>
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                      </RequesterCredentials>
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                      <DetailLevel>ReturnAll</DetailLevel>
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                      <ViewAllNodes>true</ViewAllNodes>
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    </GetCategoriesRequest>
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  XML
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                def parse_categories(doc, namespace)
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  categories = []
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  doc.xpath('//ebay:Category', namespace).each do |category|
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    category_id = category.at_xpath('.//ebay:CategoryID', namespace)&.text
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                    name = category.at_xpath('.//ebay:CategoryName', namespace)&.text
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    parent_id = category.at_xpath('.//ebay:CategoryParentID', namespace)&.text
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                    level = category.at_xpath('.//ebay:CategoryLevel', namespace)&.text.to_i
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                    leaf = category.at_xpath('.//ebay:LeafCategory', namespace)&.text == 'true'
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                    
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    next if category_id.blank? || name.blank?
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                    
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                    # Previously we skipped root categories (where category_id == parent_id)
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                    # Now we include them to ensure complete category paths for better matching with AI suggestions
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                    # next if category_id == parent_id
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                    
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                    categories << {
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                      category_id: category_id,
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                      name: name,
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                      parent_id: parent_id == '0' ? nil : parent_id,
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                      level: level,
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                      leaf: leaf,
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                      best_offer_enabled: category.at_xpath('.//ebay:BestOfferEnabled', namespace)&.text == 'true',
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                      auto_pay_enabled: category.at_xpath('.//ebay:AutoPayEnabled', namespace)&.text == 'true'
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    }
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Parsed #{categories.size} categories from eBay API"
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  categories
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                def process_categories(categories)
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  # Start a transaction to ensure data consistency
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                    # Optionally clear existing categories for this marketplace
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                    # Uncomment if you want to replace all categories each time
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                    # EbayCategory.where(marketplace_id: marketplace_id).delete_all
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                    
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                    # Process each category
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                    categories.each do |category_data|
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                      process_category(category_data)
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                    end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                def process_category(category_data)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  # Find existing category or create new one
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  category = EbayCategory.find_or_initialize_by(
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                    category_id: category_data[:category_id],
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                    marketplace_id: marketplace_id
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  )
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  # Update attributes and save
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  category.update!(
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                    name: category_data[:name],
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                    parent_id: category_data[:parent_id],
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                    level: category_data[:level],
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                    leaf: category_data[:leaf],
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                    metadata: {
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                      best_offer_enabled: category_data[:best_offer_enabled],
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                      auto_pay_enabled: category_data[:auto_pay_enabled]
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                    }
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  )
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

              end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

            end 
          
      147.

            module Ebay
