              class EndListingService
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                attr_reader :ebay_listing, :shop
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                def initialize(ebay_listing)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  @ebay_listing = ebay_listing
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  @shop = @ebay_listing.shopify_ebay_account.shop
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  @token_service = EbayTokenService.new(@shop)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                end
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                def end_listing(reason = "NotAvailable")
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  result = make_api_call("EndFixedPriceItem", build_end_request(reason))
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  if result[:success]
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Successfully ended eBay listing #{@ebay_listing.ebay_item_id}"
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    @ebay_listing.destroy!
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    true
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  else
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Failed to end eBay listing: #{result[:error]}"
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    false
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                private
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                def build_end_request(reason)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  <<~XML
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    <EndFixedPriceItemRequest xmlns="urn:ebay:apis:eBLBaseComponents">
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                      <RequesterCredentials>
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                        <eBayAuthToken>#{@token_service.fetch_or_refresh_access_token}</eBayAuthToken>
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                      </RequesterCredentials>
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                      <ItemID>#{@ebay_listing.ebay_item_id}</ItemID>
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                      <EndingReason>#{reason}</EndingReason>
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    </EndFixedPriceItemRequest>
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  XML
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                def make_api_call(call_name, request_body)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  token = @token_service.fetch_or_refresh_access_token
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  uri = URI("https://api.ebay.com/ws/api.dll")
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  headers = {
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-COMPATIBILITY-LEVEL" => "967",
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-IAF-TOKEN" => token,
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-DEV-NAME" => ENV["EBAY_DEV_ID"],
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-APP-NAME" => ENV["EBAY_CLIENT_ID"],
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-CERT-NAME" => ENV["EBAY_CLIENT_SECRET"],
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-CALL-NAME" => call_name,
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-SITEID" => "0",
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    "Content-Type" => "text/xml"
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  }
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    response = Net::HTTP.start(uri.host, uri.port, use_ssl: true) do |http|
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                      request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri, headers)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                      request.body = request_body
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                      http.request(request)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    if response.is_a?(Net::HTTPSuccess)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                      doc = Nokogiri::XML(response.body)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                      namespace = { "ebay" => "urn:ebay:apis:eBLBaseComponents" }
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      ack = doc.at_xpath("//ebay:Ack", namespace)&.text
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                      if ack == "Success" || ack == "Warning"
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                        { success: true, response: doc }
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                      else
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                        error_message = doc.at_xpath("//ebay:Errors/ebay:ShortMessage", namespace)&.text || "Unknown error"
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                        { success: false, error: error_message }
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                      end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    else
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                      { success: false, error: "HTTP Error #{response.code}" }
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    end
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Error in #{call_name}: #{e.message}"
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    { success: false, error: e.message }
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

              end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

            end
          
      82.

    app/services/ebay/image_upload_service.rb

            module Ebay

    2. 
            

            

              class ImageUploadService
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                def initialize(shop)
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                  @shop = shop
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                  @token_service = EbayTokenService.new(@shop)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                end
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                # Main method for handling different types of image inputs
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                def upload_image(input)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  case input
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  when String # URL
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                    upload_from_url(input)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  when Tempfile, File
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    upload_from_file(input)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  when ActionDispatch::Http::UploadedFile
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    upload_from_file(input)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  when ActiveStorage::Blob
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    upload_from_blob(input)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  else
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Unsupported image input type: #{input.class}"
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    { success: false, error: "Unsupported image input type" }
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                private
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                def upload_from_url(url)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    tempfile = Down.download(url)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    result = upload_from_file(tempfile)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    result
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Failed to download image from URL: #{e.message}"
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    { success: false, error: "Failed to download image: #{e.message}" }
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  ensure
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    tempfile&.close
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    tempfile&.unlink
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                def upload_from_blob(blob)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  tempfile = Tempfile.new([ "ebay_image", File.extname(blob.filename.to_s) ])
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    tempfile.binmode
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    tempfile.write(blob.download)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    tempfile.rewind
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                    result = upload_from_file(tempfile)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    result
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Failed to process blob: #{e.message}"
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    { success: false, error: "Failed to process blob: #{e.message}" }
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  ensure
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    tempfile&.close
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    tempfile&.unlink
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                def upload_from_file(file)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  token = @token_service.fetch_or_refresh_access_token
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  uri = URI("https://api.ebay.com/ws/api.dll")
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  boundary = "EbayImageUpload#{SecureRandom.hex(10)}"
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  headers = {
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-COMPATIBILITY-LEVEL" => "967",
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-IAF-TOKEN" => token,
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-DEV-NAME" => ENV["EBAY_DEV_ID"],
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-APP-NAME" => ENV["EBAY_CLIENT_ID"],
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-CERT-NAME" => ENV["EBAY_CLIENT_SECRET"],
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-CALL-NAME" => "UploadSiteHostedPictures",
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-SITEID" => "0",
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    "Content-Type" => "multipart/form-data; boundary=#{boundary}"
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  }
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  filename = file.respond_to?(:original_filename) ? file.original_filename : File.basename(file.path)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  xml_request = <<~XML
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    <UploadSiteHostedPicturesRequest xmlns="urn:ebay:apis:eBLBaseComponents">
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                      <RequesterCredentials>
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                        <eBayAuthToken>#{token}</eBayAuthToken>
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                      </RequesterCredentials>
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                      <PictureName>#{CGI.escapeHTML(filename)}</PictureName>
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    </UploadSiteHostedPicturesRequest>
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  XML
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

            
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  post_body = []
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  post_body << "--#{boundary}"
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  post_body << "Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\"XML Payload\""
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  post_body << "Content-Type: text/xml;charset=utf-8"
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  post_body << ""
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  post_body << xml_request
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  post_body << "--#{boundary}"
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  post_body << "Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\"Image\"; filename=\"#{filename}\""
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  post_body << "Content-Type: image/jpeg"
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  post_body << "Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary"
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  post_body << ""
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  post_body << File.binread(file.path)
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  post_body << "--#{boundary}--"
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                    response = Net::HTTP.start(uri.host, uri.port, use_ssl: true) do |http|
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                      request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri, headers)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                      request.body = post_body.join("\r\n")
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                      http.request(request)
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    end
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

            
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    if response.is_a?(Net::HTTPSuccess)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                      doc = Nokogiri::XML(response.body)
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                      namespace = { "ebay" => "urn:ebay:apis:eBLBaseComponents" }
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                      if doc.at_xpath("//ebay:Ack", namespace)&.text == "Success"
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                        url = doc.at_xpath("//ebay:SiteHostedPictureDetails/ebay:FullURL", namespace)&.text
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                        { success: true, url: url }
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                      else
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                        error_message = doc.at_xpath("//ebay:Errors/ebay:ShortMessage", namespace)&.text || "Unknown error"
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                        { success: false, error: error_message }
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                      end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                    else
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "HTTP Error in image upload: #{response.code} - #{response.body}"
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                      { success: false, error: "HTTP Error #{response.code}" }
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                    end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Error uploading image: #{e.message}"
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                    { success: false, error: e.message }
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

              end

                def initialize(ebay_listing, kuralis_product)

                def update_inventory

    13. 
            

            

                  if @product.base_quantity <= 0 || @product.status != "active"

                def update_listing
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  result = make_api_call("ReviseFixedPriceItem", build_revise_request)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  if result[:success]
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Successfully updated eBay listing #{@ebay_listing.ebay_item_id}"
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    # Calculate the new total_quantity to maintain the validation constraint
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    # quantity = total_quantity - quantity_sold
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    # Therefore: total_quantity = quantity + quantity_sold
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    new_total_quantity = @product.base_quantity + @ebay_listing.quantity_sold
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    @ebay_listing.update(
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                      quantity: @product.base_quantity,
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                      total_quantity: new_total_quantity,
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                      ebay_status: "active"
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    )
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    true
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  else
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Failed to update eBay listing: #{result[:error]}"
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    false
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                def end_listing

      49.

                def build_revise_request
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  <<~XML
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    <ReviseFixedPriceItemRequest xmlns="urn:ebay:apis:eBLBaseComponents">
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                      <RequesterCredentials>
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                        <eBayAuthToken>#{@token_service.fetch_or_refresh_access_token}</eBayAuthToken>
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                      </RequesterCredentials>
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                      <Item>
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                        <ItemID>#{@ebay_listing.ebay_item_id}</ItemID>
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                        <Quantity>#{@product.base_quantity}</Quantity>
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                      </Item>
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    </ReviseFixedPriceItemRequest>
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  XML
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64.

                def make_api_call(call_name, request_body)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  token = @token_service.fetch_or_refresh_access_token
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  uri = URI("https://api.ebay.com/ws/api.dll")
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  headers = {
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-COMPATIBILITY-LEVEL" => "967",
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-IAF-TOKEN" => token,
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-DEV-NAME" => ENV["EBAY_DEV_ID"],
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-APP-NAME" => ENV["EBAY_CLIENT_ID"],
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-CERT-NAME" => ENV["EBAY_CLIENT_SECRET"],
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-CALL-NAME" => call_name,
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-SITEID" => "0",
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    "Content-Type" => "text/xml"
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  }
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    response = Net::HTTP.start(uri.host, uri.port, use_ssl: true) do |http|
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                      request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri, headers)
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                      request.body = request_body
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                      http.request(request)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    if response.is_a?(Net::HTTPSuccess)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                      doc = Nokogiri::XML(response.body)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                      namespace = { "ebay" => "urn:ebay:apis:eBLBaseComponents" }
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                      ack = doc.at_xpath("//ebay:Ack", namespace)&.text
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                      if ack == "Success" || ack == "Warning"
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                        { success: true, response: doc }
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                      else
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                        error_message = doc.at_xpath("//ebay:Errors/ebay:ShortMessage", namespace)&.text || "Unknown error"
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                        { success: false, error: error_message }
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                      end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                    else
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                      { success: false, error: "HTTP Error #{response.code}" }
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                    end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Error in #{call_name}: #{e.message}"
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    { success: false, error: e.message }
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                end
          
      106.

              end

            end

            module Ebay

              class ListingService
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                attr_reader :product, :shop
          
      4.

                def initialize(kuralis_product)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                @product = kuralis_product
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @shop = @product.shop

    8. 
            

            

                @ebay_attributes = @product.ebay_product_attribute
