                def create_listing
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  # Skip if already has eBay listing
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  return false if @product.ebay_listing.present? && @product.ebay_listing.ebay_status == "active"
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  # Ensure required eBay attributes are present
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  unless @product.has_ebay_attributes?
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    raise StandardError, "Product is missing required eBay attributes"
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  # First verify the listing
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  verify_result = verify_listing
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  unless verify_result[:success]
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Listing verification failed: #{verify_result[:error]}"
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    return false
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  if verify_result[:warning]
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Proceeding with listing creation despite warning: #{verify_result[:warning]}"
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  # If verification passed, create the actual listing
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  create_fixed_price_item
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                def verify_listing
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  @api_call_name = "VerifyAddFixedPriceItem"
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  result = make_api_call(@api_call_name, build_item_request)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  if result[:warning]
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Listing verification warning: #{result[:warning]}"
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  result
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                def create_fixed_price_item
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  @api_call_name = "AddFixedPriceItem"
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  result = make_api_call(@api_call_name, build_item_request)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  if result[:success]
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    doc = result[:response]
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    namespace = { "ebay" => "urn:ebay:apis:eBLBaseComponents" }
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    ebay_item_id = doc.at_xpath("//ebay:ItemID", namespace)&.text
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    # Create eBay listing record and associate with product
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    ebay_listing = EbayListing.create_from_product(@product, ebay_item_id)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    if ebay_listing.persisted?
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                      true
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    else
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                      false
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  else
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    false
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                def make_api_call(call_name, request_body)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  token = @token_service.fetch_or_refresh_access_token
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  uri = URI("https://api.ebay.com/ws/api.dll")
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  headers = {
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-COMPATIBILITY-LEVEL" => "967",
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-IAF-TOKEN" => token,
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-DEV-NAME" => ENV["EBAY_DEV_ID"],
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-APP-NAME" => ENV["EBAY_CLIENT_ID"],
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-CERT-NAME" => ENV["EBAY_CLIENT_SECRET"],
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-CALL-NAME" => call_name,
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                    "X-EBAY-API-SITEID" => "0",
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    "Content-Type" => "text/xml"
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  }
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

            
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    response = Net::HTTP.start(uri.host, uri.port, use_ssl: true) do |http|
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                      request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri, headers)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                      request.body = request_body
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                      http.request(request)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.debug "eBay API Response: #{response.body}"
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                    if response.is_a?(Net::HTTPSuccess)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                      doc = Nokogiri::XML(response.body)
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.debug "eBay API Response: #{doc.to_xml}"
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                      namespace = { "ebay" => "urn:ebay:apis:eBLBaseComponents" }
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                      ack = doc.at_xpath("//ebay:Ack", namespace)&.text
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                      if ack == "Success" || ack == "Warning"
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                        severity = doc.at_xpath("//ebay:Errors/ebay:SeverityCode", namespace)&.text
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                        message = doc.at_xpath("//ebay:Errors/ebay:ShortMessage", namespace)&.text
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                        if severity == "Warning"
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                          Rails.logger.info "eBay API Warning (#{call_name}): #{message}"
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                        end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

            
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                        { success: true, response: doc, warning: severity == "Warning" ? message : nil }
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                      else
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                        error_message = doc.at_xpath("//ebay:Errors/ebay:ShortMessage", namespace)&.text || "Unknown error"
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.error "eBay API Error (#{call_name}): #{error_message}"
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                        { success: false, error: error_message }
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                      end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                    else
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "HTTP Error in #{call_name}: #{response.code} - #{response.body}"
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                      { success: false, error: "HTTP Error #{response.code}" }
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                    end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Error in #{call_name}: #{e.message}"
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                    { success: false, error: e.message }
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

            
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                def build_item_request
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  <<~XML
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                    <#{@api_call_name}Request xmlns="urn:ebay:apis:eBLBaseComponents">
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                      <RequesterCredentials>
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                        <eBayAuthToken>#{@token_service.fetch_or_refresh_access_token}</eBayAuthToken>
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                      </RequesterCredentials>
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                      <Item>
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                        <Title>#{CGI.escapeHTML(@product.title)}</Title>
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                        <Description>#{format_description(build_item_description)}</Description>
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                        <PrimaryCategory>
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                          <CategoryID>#{@ebay_attributes.category_id}</CategoryID>
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                        </PrimaryCategory>
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                        <Storefront>
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                          <StoreCategoryID>#{@ebay_attributes.store_category_id}</StoreCategoryID>
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                        </Storefront>
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                        <StartPrice>#{@product.base_price}</StartPrice>
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                        <ConditionID>#{@ebay_attributes.condition_id}</ConditionID>
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                        <ConditionDescription>#{CGI.escapeHTML(@ebay_attributes.condition_description.to_s)}</ConditionDescription>
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                        <Country>US</Country>
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                        <Currency>USD</Currency>
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                        <Location>US</Location>
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                        <PostalCode>#{@product.warehouse.postal_code}</PostalCode>
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                        <ListingDuration>GTC</ListingDuration>
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                        <ListingType>FixedPriceItem</ListingType>
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                        <Quantity>#{@product.base_quantity}</Quantity>
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                        #{build_item_specifics_xml}
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                        #{build_picture_details_xml}
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                        <SellerProfiles>
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                          <SellerPaymentProfile>
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                            <PaymentProfileID>#{@ebay_attributes.payment_profile_id}</PaymentProfileID>
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                          </SellerPaymentProfile>
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                          <SellerReturnProfile>
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                            <ReturnProfileID>#{@ebay_attributes.return_profile_id}</ReturnProfileID>
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                          </SellerReturnProfile>
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                          <SellerShippingProfile>
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                            <ShippingProfileID>#{@ebay_attributes.shipping_profile_id}</ShippingProfileID>
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                          </SellerShippingProfile>
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                        </SellerProfiles>
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                      </Item>
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                    </#{@api_call_name}Request>
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  XML
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

            
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                def format_description(description)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  "<![CDATA[#{description}]]>"
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                def build_item_specifics_xml
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  return "" unless @ebay_attributes.item_specifics.present?
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  specifics_xml = @ebay_attributes.item_specifics.map do |name, value|
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                    # Convert underscores to spaces and capitalize each word
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                    name = name.gsub("_", " ").split.map(&:capitalize).join(" ")
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                    <<~XML
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                      <NameValueList>
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                        <Name>#{CGI.escapeHTML(name)}</Name>
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                        <Value>#{CGI.escapeHTML(value)}</Value>
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                      </NameValueList>
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                    XML
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  end.join
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  "<ItemSpecifics>#{specifics_xml}</ItemSpecifics>"
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                end
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                def build_item_description
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  description = @product.description
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  if @shop.store_location_in_description?
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                    description = "#{@product.location}\n\n#{description}"
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                  end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  if @shop.append_description?
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                    description += "\n\n#{@shop.default_description}"
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  end
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

            
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                  description
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

            
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                def build_picture_details_xml
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                  return "" unless @product.images.attached?
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                  image_upload_service = Ebay::ImageUploadService.new(@shop)
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                  uploaded_urls = []
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

            
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                  # Get eBay-compatible image URLs
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                  @product.ebay_compatible_image_urls.each do |image_url|
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                    result = image_upload_service.upload_image(image_url)
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                    if result[:success]
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                      uploaded_urls << result[:url]
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                    else
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "Failed to upload image to eBay: #{result[:error]}"
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                    end
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                  end
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

            
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                  return "" if uploaded_urls.empty?
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

            
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                  urls_xml = uploaded_urls.map do |url|
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                    "<PictureURL>#{CGI.escapeHTML(url)}</PictureURL>"
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                  end.join
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

            
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                  "<PictureDetails>#{urls_xml}</PictureDetails>"
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                end
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

              end
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

            end
          
      228.

    app/services/ebay/taxonomy_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    49 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 49 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            module Ebay
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              class TaxonomyService
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                def initialize(ebay_account)
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                  @ebay_account = ebay_account
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                  @shop = ebay_account.shop
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  @token_service = EbayTokenService.new(@shop)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                end
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                def fetch_item_aspects(category_id)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  token = @token_service.fetch_or_refresh_access_token
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  # The Taxonomy API uses a different endpoint and requires a category tree ID
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  # For US marketplace, the category tree ID is typically 0
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  uri = URI("https://api.ebay.com/commerce/taxonomy/v1/category_tree/0/get_item_aspects_for_category?category_id=#{category_id}")
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  headers = {
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    'Authorization' => "Bearer #{token}",
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    'X-EBAY-C-MARKETPLACE-ID' => 'EBAY_US'
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  }
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    response = Net::HTTP.start(uri.host, uri.port, use_ssl: true) do |http|
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                      request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(uri, headers)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                      http.request(request)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    if response.is_a?(Net::HTTPSuccess)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                      aspects = JSON.parse(response.body)['aspects'] || []
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                      
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                      # Transform the response into our desired format
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                      aspects.map do |aspect|
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                        {
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                          name: aspect['localizedAspectName'],
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                          required: aspect['aspectConstraint']['aspectRequired'],
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                          values: aspect['aspectValues']&.map { |v| v['localizedValue'] } || [],
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                          value_type: determine_value_type(aspect)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                        }
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                      end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    else
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "Failed to fetch item aspects: #{response.body}"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                      []
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Error fetching item aspects: #{e.message}"
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    []
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                private
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                def determine_value_type(aspect)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  # Determine input type based on aspect properties
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  if aspect['aspectValues']&.any?
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    aspect['aspectConstraint']['aspectMode'] == 'FREE_TEXT' ? 'text_with_suggestions' : 'select'
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  else
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    'text'
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

              end
          
      61.

            end

            class EbayFulfillmentService

              def initialize(shop)

                @shop = shop

                @ebay_account = shop.shopify_ebay_account

                @token_service = EbayTokenService.new(shop)

      7.

              def fetch_policies
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                access_token = @token_service.fetch_or_refresh_access_token
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                uri = URI('https://api.ebay.com/sell/account/v1/fulfillment_policy?marketplace_id=EBAY_US')

    12. 
            

            

                
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                # TODO: Figure out why we didnt have permissions for our

    14.

                  'Authorization' => "Bearer #{access_token}",
          
      16.

                  'Content-Type' => 'application/json'
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                }
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                begin
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  response = Net::HTTP.start(uri.host, uri.port, use_ssl: true) do |http|
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(uri, headers)

    23.

      24.

                  if response.is_a?(Net::HTTPSuccess)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    policies = JSON.parse(response.body)['fulfillmentPolicies']
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    update_shipping_profiles(policies)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Successfully fetched and updated #{policies.size} shipping policies"
          
      29.

                    { success: true, policies: policies }
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30.

      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Failed to fetch shipping policies: #{response.body}"
          
      32.

                  end
          
      34.

              def update_shipping_profiles(new_policies)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                formatted_policies = new_policies.map do |policy|
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  {
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    'id' => policy['fulfillmentPolicyId'],
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    'name' => policy['name']
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  }
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                # Get the new policy IDs
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                new_policy_ids = formatted_policies.map { |p| p['id'] }
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                # Get the existing policy IDs
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                existing_policy_ids = @ebay_account.shipping_profiles.map { |p| p['id'] }
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                # Find policies that no longer exist
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                removed_policy_ids = existing_policy_ids - new_policy_ids
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                if removed_policy_ids.any?
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  # Remove weights for deleted policies
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  removed_policy_ids.each do |policy_id|
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    @ebay_account.shipping_profile_weights.delete(policy_id)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Removed #{removed_policy_ids.size} obsolete shipping policies"
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                # Update the shipping profiles
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                @ebay_account.update(
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  shipping_profiles: formatted_policies,
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  shipping_profile_weights: @ebay_account.shipping_profile_weights.slice(*new_policy_ids)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                )
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            end

            class EbayNotificationService

              def self.subscribe_to_notifications(shop)

                ebay_account = shop.shopify_ebay_account

      6.

      7.

                notification_types = [

      10.

              private

              def self.build_subscription_request(notification_type, endpoint_url)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                <<~XML
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  <SetNotificationPreferencesRequest xmlns="urn:ebay:apis:eBLBaseComponents">
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    <ApplicationDeliveryPreferences>
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                      <ApplicationEnable>Enable</ApplicationEnable>
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                      <ApplicationURL>#{endpoint_url}</ApplicationURL>
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                      <DeviceType>Platform</DeviceType>
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    </ApplicationDeliveryPreferences>
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    <UserDeliveryPreferenceArray>
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                      <NotificationEnable>
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                        <EventType>#{notification_type}</EventType>
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                        <EventEnable>Enable</EventEnable>
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                      </NotificationEnable>
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    </UserDeliveryPreferenceArray>
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                    <Version>967</Version>
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  </SetNotificationPreferencesRequest>
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                XML
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

              end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            end

    app/services/ebay_oauth_service.rb

            require 'httparty'
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            class EbayOauthService
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              include HTTParty
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              base_uri 'https://api.ebay.com'
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              BASE_URL = 'https://auth.ebay.com/oauth2/authorize'
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              def initialize
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @client_id = ENV['EBAY_CLIENT_ID']
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                @client_secret = ENV['EBAY_CLIENT_SECRET']
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                @ru_name = ENV['EBAY_RUNAME']
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                @scopes = ['https://api.ebay.com/oauth/api_scope',
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  'https://api.ebay.com/oauth/api_scope/sell.inventory',
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  'https://api.ebay.com/oauth/api_scope/sell.account',
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  'https://api.ebay.com/oauth/api_scope/sell.fulfillment']
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              def authorization_url
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                "#{BASE_URL}?client_id=#{@client_id}&response_type=code&redirect_uri=#{ERB::Util.url_encode(@ru_name)}&scope=#{ERB::Util.url_encode(@scopes.join(' '))}"
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              def fetch_access_token(auth_code)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                body = {
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  grant_type: 'authorization_code',
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  code: auth_code,
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  redirect_uri: @ru_name
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                }
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                auth = Base64.strict_encode64("#{@client_id}:#{@client_secret}")
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                response = self.class.post('/identity/v1/oauth2/token', {
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  headers: {
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    'Authorization' => "Basic #{auth}",
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    'Content-Type' => 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  },
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  body: URI.encode_www_form(body)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                })
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                if response.code != 200
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error("Failed to fetch access token: #{response.body}")
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                response
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              def fetch_access_token_with_refresh_token(refresh_token)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                body = {
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  grant_type: 'refresh_token',
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  refresh_token: refresh_token
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                }
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                auth = Base64.strict_encode64("#{@client_id}:#{@client_secret}")
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                self.class.post('/identity/v1/oauth2/token', {
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  headers: {
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    'Authorization' => "Basic #{auth}",
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    'Content-Type' => 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  },
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  body: URI.encode_www_form(body)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                })
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

              end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            end

            class EbayStoreService

              def initialize(shop)
          
      3.

                @shop = shop

                @ebay_account = shop.shopify_ebay_account

                @token_service = EbayTokenService.new(shop)

      7.

              def fetch_store_categories
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                token = @token_service.fetch_or_refresh_access_token
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                uri = URI('https://api.ebay.com/ws/api.dll')
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                headers = {
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  'X-EBAY-API-COMPATIBILITY-LEVEL' => '967',
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  'X-EBAY-API-IAF-TOKEN' => token,
          
      16.

                  'X-EBAY-API-CALL-NAME' => 'GetStore',

                  'X-EBAY-API-SITEID' => '0',

                  'Content-Type' => 'text/xml'

    19. 
            

            

                }
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20.

    21. 
            

            

                xml_request = build_get_store_request
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                begin
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  response = Net::HTTP.start(uri.host, uri.port, use_ssl: true) do |http|
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri, headers)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    request.body = xml_request
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    http.request(request)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  if response.is_a?(Net::HTTPSuccess)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    doc = Nokogiri::XML(response.body)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    namespace = { "ebay" => "urn:ebay:apis:eBLBaseComponents" }
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    if doc.at_xpath('//ebay:Store/ebay:CustomCategories', namespace)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                      categories = parse_store_categories(doc, namespace)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                      update_store_categories(categories)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info "Successfully fetched and updated #{categories.size} store categories"
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                      { success: true, categories: categories }
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    else
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "No custom categories found in store"
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                      { success: false, error: "No custom categories found" }
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  else
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Failed to fetch store categories: #{response.body}"
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    { success: false, error: "HTTP #{response.code}: #{response.body}" }
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  end
          
      47.

                rescue => e

              def build_get_store_request
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                <<~XML
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  <GetStoreRequest xmlns="urn:ebay:apis:eBLBaseComponents">
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    <RequesterCredentials>
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                      <eBayAuthToken>#{@token_service.fetch_or_refresh_access_token}</eBayAuthToken>
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    </RequesterCredentials>
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    <CategoryStructureOnly>true</CategoryStructureOnly>
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  </GetStoreRequest>
          
      64.
