              def self.process_order_with_idempotency(order_data, platform, shop)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                new(order_data, platform, shop).process_with_idempotency
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              end
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              def initialize(order_data, platform, shop)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                @order_data = order_data
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                @platform = platform.downcase
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                @shop = shop
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                @order = nil
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                @processed_items = []
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                @errors = []

    19. 
            

            

              end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21.

              def process_with_idempotency
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                # Generate idempotency key from order data
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                idempotency_key = generate_order_idempotency_key
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                # Check if order was already processed
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                if Rails.cache.exist?("order_processed:#{idempotency_key}")
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Skipping duplicate order processing for key=#{idempotency_key}"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  return Rails.cache.read("order_result:#{idempotency_key}")
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                # Process the order within a transaction
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                result = nil
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                begin
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    result = process_order
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  # Cache successful result
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  Rails.cache.write("order_processed:#{idempotency_key}", true, expires_in: IDEMPOTENCY_TTL)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  Rails.cache.write("order_result:#{idempotency_key}", result, expires_in: IDEMPOTENCY_TTL)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Successfully processed order: #{@order&.platform_order_id}"
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  result
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error processing order: #{e.message}"
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  # Don't cache failed processing attempts
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  create_processing_error_notification(e)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  raise OrderProcessingError, "Failed to process order: #{e.message}"
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

              end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              private
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              def process_order
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                # Step 1: Create or update the order record
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                create_or_update_order
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                # Step 2: Process order items and inventory
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                process_order_items
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                # Step 3: Handle order status changes
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                handle_order_status_changes
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                # Return processing summary
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                {
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  order: @order,
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  processed_items: @processed_items,
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  errors: @errors,
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  success: @errors.empty?
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                }
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

              end
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

              def create_or_update_order
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                platform_order_id = extract_platform_order_id
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                @order = @shop.orders.find_or_initialize_by(
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  platform: @platform,
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  platform_order_id: platform_order_id
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                )
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                # Update order attributes based on platform
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                if @platform == "ebay"

    86. 
            

            

                  update_ebay_order_attributes
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                elsif @platform == "shopify"
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  update_shopify_order_attributes
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                @order.save!
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

              end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

            
          
      94.

              def process_order_items
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                line_items = extract_line_items
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                line_items.each do |item_data|
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                    process_single_order_item(item_data)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                    @errors << "Failed to process item #{item_data}: #{e.message}"
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Error processing order item: #{e.message}"
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

              end
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

            
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

              def process_single_order_item(item_data)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                # Extract item details based on platform
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                if @platform == "ebay"
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  process_ebay_order_item(item_data)
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                elsif @platform == "shopify"
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  process_shopify_order_item(item_data)
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

              end
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

              def process_ebay_order_item(item_data)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                quantity = item_data["quantity"].to_i
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                ebay_item_id = item_data["legacyItemId"]
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                # Find the associated Kuralis product
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                kuralis_product = EbayListing.find_by(ebay_item_id: ebay_item_id)&.kuralis_product
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

            
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                # Create order item
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                order_item = @order.order_items.find_or_initialize_by(
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  platform: "ebay",
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  platform_item_id: ebay_item_id
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                )
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                order_item.assign_attributes(
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  title: item_data["title"],
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  quantity: quantity,
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  kuralis_product: kuralis_product
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                )
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                order_item.save!
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

            
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                # Process inventory if we have a Kuralis product
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                if kuralis_product && should_adjust_inventory?(kuralis_product)
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  process_inventory_for_item(kuralis_product, quantity, order_item)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                @processed_items << order_item
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

              end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

              def process_shopify_order_item(item_data)
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                quantity = item_data["quantity"].to_i
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                product_id = extract_id_from_gid(item_data["product"]["id"]) if item_data["product"]
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                return unless product_id # Skip if product was deleted
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                # Find the associated Kuralis product
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                kuralis_product = ShopifyProduct.find_by(shopify_product_id: product_id)&.kuralis_product
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                # Create order item
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                order_item = @order.order_items.find_or_initialize_by(
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  platform: "shopify",
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  platform_item_id: product_id
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                )
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

            
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                order_item.assign_attributes(
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  title: item_data["title"],
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  quantity: quantity,
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  kuralis_product: kuralis_product
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                )
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                order_item.save!
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                # Process inventory if we have a Kuralis product
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                if kuralis_product && should_adjust_inventory?(kuralis_product)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  process_inventory_for_item(kuralis_product, quantity, order_item)
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                @processed_items << order_item
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

              end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

              def process_inventory_for_item(kuralis_product, quantity, order_item)
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                if order_cancelled?
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                  InventoryService.release_inventory(
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                    kuralis_product: kuralis_product,
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                    quantity: quantity,
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                    order: @order,
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                    order_item: order_item
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  )
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                else
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  InventoryService.allocate_inventory(
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                    kuralis_product: kuralis_product,
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                    quantity: quantity,
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                    order: @order,
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                    order_item: order_item
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  )
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

              rescue InventoryService::InsufficientInventoryError => e
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                @errors << "Insufficient inventory for #{kuralis_product.title}: #{e.message}"
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.warn "Insufficient inventory for order #{@order.platform_order_id}: #{e.message}"
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                @errors << "Inventory processing failed for #{kuralis_product.title}: #{e.message}"
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Inventory processing error: #{e.message}"
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

              end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

            
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

              def should_adjust_inventory?(kuralis_product)
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                return false unless @shop.inventory_sync?
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                return false unless @order.order_placed_at.present?
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

            
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                # For products with platform associations, check when the platform listing was last synced
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                # This prevents double-counting sales that occurred before we got the current inventory state
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                case kuralis_product.source_platform
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                when "ebay"
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                  # Use the eBay listing's last_sync_at timestamp (when we last got current inventory state)
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                  return false unless kuralis_product.ebay_listing.present?
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

            
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                  platform_sync_time = kuralis_product.ebay_listing.last_sync_at || kuralis_product.ebay_listing.created_at
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "eBay order check: order_placed_at=#{@order.order_placed_at}, ebay_listing_last_sync_at=#{platform_sync_time}"
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

            
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                  @order.order_placed_at > platform_sync_time
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

            
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                when "shopify"
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                  # Use the Shopify product's last_synced_at timestamp (when we last got current inventory state)
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                  return false unless kuralis_product.shopify_product.present?
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

            
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                  platform_sync_time = kuralis_product.shopify_product.last_synced_at || kuralis_product.shopify_product.created_at
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "Shopify order check: order_placed_at=#{@order.order_placed_at}, shopify_product_last_synced_at=#{platform_sync_time}"
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

            
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  @order.order_placed_at > platform_sync_time
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

            
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                else
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                  # For products created directly in Kuralis (AI, manual), use the product's imported_at
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                  return false unless kuralis_product.imported_at.present?
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "Direct product check: order_placed_at=#{@order.order_placed_at}, imported_at=#{kuralis_product.imported_at}"
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

            
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                  @order.order_placed_at > kuralis_product.imported_at
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                end
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

              end
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

            
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

              def handle_order_status_changes
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                # Handle any special order status logic here
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                # This is where you could add logic for:
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                # - Order fulfillment status changes
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                # - Payment status updates
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                # - Cancellation handling
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                # - etc.
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

              end
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

            
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

              def order_cancelled?
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                # Check if order is cancelled based on platform-specific logic
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                case @platform
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                when "ebay"
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                  @order_data.dig("orderFulfillmentStatus") == "CANCELLED" ||
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                    @order_data.dig("cancelStatus", "cancelState") == "CANCELED"
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                when "shopify"
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                  @order_data["cancelled"] == true ||
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                    @order_data["displayFinancialStatus"]&.downcase == "cancelled"
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                else
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                  false
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                end
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

              end
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

            
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

              def extract_platform_order_id
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                case @platform
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                when "ebay"
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                  @order_data["orderId"]
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                when "shopify"
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                  extract_id_from_gid(@order_data["id"])
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                end
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

              end
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

            
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

              def extract_line_items
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                case @platform
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                when "ebay"
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                  @order_data["lineItems"] || []
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                when "shopify"
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                  @order_data["lineItems"]["edges"]&.map { |edge| edge["node"] } || []
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                end
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

              end
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

            
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

              def update_ebay_order_attributes
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                order_status = determine_ebay_order_status
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                shipping_cost = calculate_ebay_shipping_cost
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

            
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                subtotal = BigDecimal(@order_data["pricingSummary"]["priceSubtotal"]["value"].to_s)
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                total_price = BigDecimal(@order_data["pricingSummary"]["total"]["value"].to_s)
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

            
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                @order.assign_attributes(
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                  subtotal: subtotal,
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                  total_price: total_price,
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                  shipping_cost: shipping_cost,
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                  fulfillment_status: order_status,
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

                  payment_status: @order_data["orderPaymentStatus"],
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                  paid_at: @order_data["paymentSummary"]["payments"]&.first&.dig("paymentDate"),
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                  shipping_address: extract_ebay_shipping_address,
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

                  customer_name: extract_ebay_buyer_name,
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

                  order_placed_at: @order_data["creationDate"],
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                  last_synced_at: Time.current
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

                )
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

              end
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

            
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

              def update_shopify_order_attributes
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

                @order.assign_attributes(
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                  subtotal: @order_data["subtotalPriceSet"]["shopMoney"]["amount"].to_f,
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

                  total_price: @order_data["totalPriceSet"]["shopMoney"]["amount"].to_f,
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

                  shipping_cost: @order_data["totalShippingPriceSet"]["shopMoney"]["amount"].to_f,
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

                  fulfillment_status: @order_data["displayFulfillmentStatus"]&.downcase,
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

                  payment_status: @order_data["displayFinancialStatus"]&.downcase,
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

                  paid_at: @order_data["processedAt"],
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

                  shipping_address: nil, # Not available with current permissions
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

                  customer_name: nil,    # Not available with current permissions

      309.

              def determine_ebay_order_status

      315.

                  order_status = "cancelled"

              def extract_ebay_shipping_address

              def generate_order_idempotency_key

                # Create a unique key based on platform, order ID, and items

              def extract_id_from_gid(gid)

            class PlatformSyncService
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              # Sync a KuralisProduct with all connected platforms
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              #
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              # @param kuralis_product [KuralisProduct] The product to sync
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              # @param options [Hash] Optional parameters
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # @option options [String] :skip_platform Platform to skip updating (e.g., "shopify", "ebay")
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              # @option options [Boolean] :inventory_only Whether to only sync inventory, not other fields
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              def self.sync_product(kuralis_product, options = {})
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                # Extract options
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                skip_platform = options[:skip_platform]&.downcase
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                # Sync with Shopify if connected and not skipped
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                if kuralis_product.shopify_product.present? && skip_platform != "shopify"
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  Shopify::UpdateProductInventoryJob.perform_later(
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    kuralis_product.shop.id,
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    kuralis_product.shopify_product.id,
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    kuralis_product.id
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  )
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                # Sync with eBay if connected and not skipped
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                if kuralis_product.ebay_listing.present? && skip_platform != "ebay"
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  Ebay::UpdateListingInventoryJob.perform_later(
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    kuralis_product.shop.id,
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    kuralis_product.ebay_listing.id,
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26.

      27.

                  )
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                end

    29. 
            

            

              end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            end

            class ProductStatusService

              class StatusUpdateError < StandardError; end
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              # Valid status transitions
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              VALID_TRANSITIONS = {
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                "active" => [ "inactive", "completed" ],
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                "inactive" => [ "active", "completed" ],
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                "completed" => [ "active", "inactive" ],
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                "draft" => [ "active", "inactive" ]
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              }.freeze
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              # Redis connection for locking
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              def redis_connection
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                @redis_connection ||= Redis.new(
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  url: ENV.fetch("REDIS_URL", "redis://localhost:6379/0")
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                )
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              def self.update_product_status(kuralis_product, new_status, reason: nil, user_id: nil)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                new(kuralis_product).update_status(new_status, reason: reason, user_id: user_id)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              def initialize(kuralis_product)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                @kuralis_product = kuralis_product
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                @shop = kuralis_product.shop
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                @old_status = kuralis_product.status
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                @errors = []
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              def update_status(new_status, reason: nil, user_id: nil)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                return false if new_status == @old_status
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                # Validate status transition
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                unless valid_transition?(new_status)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  @errors << "Invalid status transition from #{@old_status} to #{new_status}"
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  return false
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                # Use distributed lock for status changes
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                lock_key = "status_lock:#{@kuralis_product.id}"
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                begin
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  redis_connection.lock_for_update(lock_key) do
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    update_status_atomic(new_status, reason, user_id)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                rescue Timeout::Error
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  @errors << "Could not acquire status lock within timeout"
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Status lock timeout for product_id=#{@kuralis_product.id}"
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  false
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  @errors << "Status update failed: #{e.message}"
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Status update error for product_id=#{@kuralis_product.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  false
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              def errors
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                @errors
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

              end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

              private
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

              def update_status_atomic(new_status, reason, user_id)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  # Update the Kuralis product status
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  @kuralis_product.update!(
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    status: new_status,
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    last_inventory_update: Time.current
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  )
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  # Log the status change
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  log_status_change(new_status, reason, user_id)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  # Handle platform-specific status updates
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  handle_platform_status_updates(new_status)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  # Create notification for significant status changes
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  create_status_change_notification(new_status, reason)
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Product #{@kuralis_product.id} status changed: #{@old_status}  #{new_status}"
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  true
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                end
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

              end
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

              def valid_transition?(new_status)
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                return true unless VALID_TRANSITIONS.key?(@old_status)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                VALID_TRANSITIONS[@old_status].include?(new_status)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

              end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

              def handle_platform_status_updates(new_status)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                case new_status
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                when "inactive", "completed"
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  # End/disable listings on all platforms
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  disable_all_platform_listings
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                when "active"
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  # Reactivate listings if inventory is available
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  if @kuralis_product.base_quantity > 0
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                    reactivate_platform_listings
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  else
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                    # If no inventory, keep as completed status
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                    @kuralis_product.update!(status: "completed")
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

              end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

              def disable_all_platform_listings
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                results = []
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                # Disable Shopify product
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                if @kuralis_product.shopify_product.present?
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  result = disable_shopify_product
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  results << { platform: "shopify", success: result }
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                # End eBay listing
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                if @kuralis_product.ebay_listing.present?
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  result = end_ebay_listing
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  results << { platform: "ebay", success: result }
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                end
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

            
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                # Schedule async updates for better error handling
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                if results.any? { |r| !r[:success] }
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  schedule_platform_status_retry
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                results
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

              end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

              def reactivate_platform_listings
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                results = []
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                # Reactivate Shopify product
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                if @kuralis_product.shopify_product.present?
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  result = reactivate_shopify_product
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  results << { platform: "shopify", success: result }
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                # For eBay, we typically can't reactivate ended listings
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                # Users would need to create new listings
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                if @kuralis_product.ebay_listing.present?
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "eBay listing cannot be reactivated automatically - user must create new listing"
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  results << { platform: "ebay", success: false, reason: "Manual reactivation required" }
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                results
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

              end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

            
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

              def disable_shopify_product
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                begin
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  service = Shopify::EndProductService.new(@kuralis_product.shopify_product)
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  service.end_product
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Failed to disable Shopify product: #{e.message}"
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                  false
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                end
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

              end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

            
          
      158.
