              def reactivate_shopify_product
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                begin
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  service = Shopify::InventoryService.new(
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                    @kuralis_product.shopify_product,
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    @kuralis_product
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  )
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  service.update_inventory
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Failed to reactivate Shopify product: #{e.message}"
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  false
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                end
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

              end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

              def end_ebay_listing
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                begin
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  service = Ebay::EndListingService.new(@kuralis_product.ebay_listing)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  service.end_listing("NotAvailable")
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Failed to end eBay listing: #{e.message}"
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  false
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

              end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

              def log_status_change(new_status, reason, user_id)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                # Create an inventory transaction to track status changes
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                InventoryTransaction.create!(
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  kuralis_product: @kuralis_product,
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  quantity: 0, # No quantity change for status updates
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  transaction_type: "status_change",
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                  previous_quantity: @kuralis_product.base_quantity,
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  new_quantity: @kuralis_product.base_quantity,
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                  notes: "Status changed from #{@old_status} to #{new_status}. Reason: #{reason || 'Not specified'}",
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  processed: true # Status changes are immediately processed
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                )
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

              end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

              def create_status_change_notification(new_status, reason)
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                # Only notify for significant status changes
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                return unless significant_status_change?(new_status)
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

            
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                Notification.create!(
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                  shop_id: @shop.id,
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  title: "Product Status Changed",
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  message: "Product '#{@kuralis_product.title}' status changed from #{@old_status} to #{new_status}",
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                  category: "product",
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                  status: notification_status(new_status),
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                  metadata: {
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                    product_id: @kuralis_product.id,
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                    old_status: @old_status,
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                    new_status: new_status,
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                    reason: reason,
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                    timestamp: Time.current
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                  }
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                )
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

              end
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

            
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

              def significant_status_change?(new_status)
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                # Notify for changes to/from completed status or when going inactive
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                (@old_status == "completed" || new_status == "completed") ||
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                (@old_status == "active" && new_status == "inactive")
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

              end
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

            
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

              def notification_status(new_status)
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                case new_status
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                when "completed" then "warning"
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                when "inactive" then "info"
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                when "active" then "success"
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                else "info"
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                end
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

              end
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

              def schedule_platform_status_retry
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                # Schedule a retry job for failed platform updates
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                PlatformStatusRetryJob.set(wait: 1.minute).perform_later(@kuralis_product.id)
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

              end
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

            end
          
      234.

    app/services/shopify/bulk_import_tracker.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    41 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 41 lines missed.

            module Shopify
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              class BulkImportTracker
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                REDIS_KEY_PREFIX = "shopify_bulk_import"
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                def self.current_job_run_id
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  Rails.cache.read("#{REDIS_KEY_PREFIX}:current_job_run_id")
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                end
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                def self.job_progress(job_run_id = nil)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  job_run_id ||= current_job_run_id
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  return nil unless job_run_id
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  total_batches = Rails.cache.read("#{REDIS_KEY_PREFIX}:#{job_run_id}:total_batches").to_i
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  completed_batches = Rails.cache.read("#{REDIS_KEY_PREFIX}:#{job_run_id}:completed_batches").to_i
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  total_products = Rails.cache.read("#{REDIS_KEY_PREFIX}:#{job_run_id}:total_products").to_i
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  successful_products = Rails.cache.read("#{REDIS_KEY_PREFIX}:#{job_run_id}:successful_products").to_i
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  failed_products = Rails.cache.read("#{REDIS_KEY_PREFIX}:#{job_run_id}:failed_products").to_i
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  {
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    job_run_id: job_run_id,
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    total_batches: total_batches,
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    completed_batches: completed_batches,
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    percent_complete: total_batches > 0 ? (completed_batches.to_f / total_batches * 100).round(1) : 0,
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    total_products: total_products,
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    successful_products: successful_products,
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    failed_products: failed_products,
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    in_progress: completed_batches < total_batches
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  }
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                def self.for_job(job)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  # Check if this is a BatchCreateListingsJob
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  return nil unless job.is_a?(Shopify::BatchCreateListingsJob) ||
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                                    (job.respond_to?(:job_class) && job.job_class == "Shopify::BatchCreateListingsJob")
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  # Extract the job run ID from the job's arguments or look up the current one
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  args = job.respond_to?(:arguments) ? job.arguments : {}
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  batch_index = args[:batch_index] || 0
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  total_batches = args[:total_batches] || 0
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  # Get overall progress
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  progress = job_progress
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  return nil unless progress
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  # Add job-specific information
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  progress.merge({
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                    batch_index: batch_index,
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    batch_number: batch_index + 1,
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    is_current_batch: progress[:completed_batches] == batch_index
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  })
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            end
          
      54.

    app/services/shopify/end_product_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    94 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 94 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            module Shopify
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              class EndProductService
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                attr_reader :shopify_product, :shop
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                def initialize(shopify_product)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  @shopify_product = shopify_product
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  @shop = @shopify_product.shop
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  @client = ShopifyAPI::Clients::Graphql::Admin.new(session: @shop.shopify_session)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                end
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                def end_product
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  if @shop.shopify_archive_products?
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                    archive_product
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  else
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    delete_product
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                private
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                def archive_product
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  result = @client.query(
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    query: end_product_mutation,
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    variables: {
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                      input: {
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                        id: @shopify_product.gid,
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                        status: "ARCHIVED"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                      }
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    }
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  )
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  if result.body["data"] && result.body["data"]["productUpdate"] && result.body["data"]["productUpdate"]["product"]
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Successfully archived Shopify product #{@shopify_product.shopify_product_id}"
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    @shopify_product.update(status: "archived")
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    true
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  else
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    error_message = result.body["errors"] || result.body["data"]&.dig("productUpdate", "userErrors")
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Failed to archive Shopify product: #{error_message}"
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    false
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  end

                rescue => e

      44.

                def delete_product
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  result = @client.query(
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49.

    50.

      53.

      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    }

    55.

      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  if result.body["data"] && result.body["data"]["productDelete"] && result.body["data"]["productDelete"]["deletedProductId"]
          
      58.

                    Rails.logger.info "Successfully deleted Shopify product #{@shopify_product.shopify_product_id}"
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    # Remove the record from our database
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    @shopify_product.destroy!
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61.

    62. 
            

            

                  else
          
      63.

      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64.

      65.

                def end_product_mutation
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  <<~GQL
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    mutation productUpdate($input: ProductInput!) {
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                      productUpdate(input: $input) {
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                        product {
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                          id
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                          status
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                        }
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                        userErrors {
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                          field
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                          message

    84. 
            

            

                        }
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                      }
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                    }

      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                    mutation productDelete($input: ProductDeleteInput!) {

      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                          field
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                          message

                def update_inventory
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Updating Shopify inventory for product_id=#{@product.id}, quantity=#{@product.base_quantity}"
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  # Handle different inventory scenarios
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  if @product.base_quantity.zero?
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    handle_zero_inventory
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  else
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    handle_inventory_update
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21.

      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                end
          
      23.

                def update_product
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  # Update product details
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  # product_updated = update_product_details
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  # Update variant price
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  # variant_updated = update_variant_price
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31.

                  inventory_updated = update_inventory_level
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33.

                  if inventory_updated
          
      35.

                    @shopify_product.update(
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36.

      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37.

      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38.

      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Updated Shopify product #{@shopify_product.shopify_product_id} with latest information"
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    true
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  else
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Failed to update inventory of Shopify product"
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    false
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      46.

                  Rails.logger.error "Failed to update Shopify product: #{e.message}"
          
      47.

                def update_inventory_level
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  # Get the inventory item ID
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  variant_data = get_first_variant_id
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  if variant_data.nil? || variant_data[:inventory_item_id].nil?
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Could not find a valid inventory item ID for product #{@shopify_product.gid}"
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                    return false
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  delta = @product.base_quantity - @shopify_product.quantity
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  # Skip if there's no change needed
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  if delta == 0
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "No inventory adjustment needed for product #{@shopify_product.shopify_product_id} (current: #{@shopify_product.quantity}, target: #{@product.base_quantity})"
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                    return true
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Adjusting inventory for product #{@shopify_product.shopify_product_id} by #{delta} (current: #{@shopify_product.quantity}, target: #{@product.base_quantity})"
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  inventory_item_id = variant_data[:inventory_item_id]
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Updating inventory for item ID: #{inventory_item_id}"
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

            
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  result = @client.query(
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                    query: inventory_update_mutation,
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                    variables: {
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                      input: {
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                        reason: "other",
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                        name: "available",
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                        changes: [
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                          {
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                            inventoryItemId: inventory_item_id,
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                            locationId: @shop.default_location_id,
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                            delta: delta
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                          }
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                        ]
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                      }
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                    }
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  )
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                  if result.body["data"] && result.body["data"]["inventoryAdjustQuantities"] &&
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                     !result.body["data"]["inventoryAdjustQuantities"]["userErrors"]&.any?
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Successfully adjusted inventory by #{delta}"
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                    true
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  else
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                    error_message = result.body["errors"] || result.body["data"]&.dig("inventoryAdjustQuantities", "userErrors")
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Failed to update Shopify inventory: #{error_message}"
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                    false
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Failed to update Shopify inventory: #{e.message}"
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  false
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                def disable_product
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  # For Shopify, we'll use the EndProductService to handle unpublishing
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  end_service = Shopify::EndProductService.new(@shopify_product)
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  end_service.end_product
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                private
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                def product_update_mutation
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  <<~GQL
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                    mutation productUpdate($input: ProductInput!) {
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                      productUpdate(input: $input) {
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                        product {
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                          id
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                          title
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                          status
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                        }
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                        userErrors {
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                          field
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                          message
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                        }
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                      }
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                    }
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  GQL
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                def variant_update_mutation
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  <<~GQL
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                    mutation productVariantsBulkUpdate($productId: ID!, $variants: [ProductVariantsBulkInput!]!) {
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                      productVariantsBulkUpdate(productId: $productId, variants: $variants) {
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                        product {
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                          id
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                        }
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                        productVariants {
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                          id
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                          price
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                        }
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                        userErrors {
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                          field
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                          message
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                        }
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                      }
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                    }
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                  GQL
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                end
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

            
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                def inventory_update_mutation
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                  <<~GQL
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                    mutation inventoryAdjustQuantities($input: InventoryAdjustQuantitiesInput!) {
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                      inventoryAdjustQuantities(input: $input) {
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                        inventoryAdjustmentGroup {
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                          id
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                        }
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                        userErrors {
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                          field
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                          message
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                        }
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                      }
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                    }
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                  GQL
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                end
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

            
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                # Add this new private method to get the first variant ID
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                def get_first_variant_id
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                  query = <<~GQL
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                    query {
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                      product(id: "#{@shopify_product.gid}") {
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                        variants(first: 1) {
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                          edges {
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                            node {
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                              id
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                              inventoryItem {
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                                id
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                              }
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                            }
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                          }
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                        }
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                      }
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                    }
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                  GQL
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

            
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                  result = @client.query(query: query)
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

            
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                  # Log the full response for debugging
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "Variant query response: #{result.body.inspect}"
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

            
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                  if result.body["errors"]
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "GraphQL errors when fetching variant: #{result.body["errors"].inspect}"
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                    return nil
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                  end
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

            
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                  if result.body["data"] && result.body["data"]["product"] &&
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                     result.body["data"]["product"]["variants"] &&
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                     result.body["data"]["product"]["variants"]["edges"] &&
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                     !result.body["data"]["product"]["variants"]["edges"].empty? &&
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                     result.body["data"]["product"]["variants"]["edges"].first["node"]
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

            
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                    variant = result.body["data"]["product"]["variants"]["edges"].first["node"]
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                    variant_id = variant["id"]
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                    inventory_item_id = variant["inventoryItem"] ? variant["inventoryItem"]["id"] : nil
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

            
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Successfully retrieved variant ID: #{variant_id}"
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Associated inventory item ID: #{inventory_item_id}"
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

            
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                    {
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                      variant_id: variant_id,
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                      inventory_item_id: inventory_item_id
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                    }
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                  else
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Product exists but no variants found or unexpected response structure: #{result.body.inspect}"
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                    nil
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                  end
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Error fetching variant ID: #{e.message}"
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                end
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

            
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                def handle_zero_inventory
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                  case @product.status
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                  when "completed"
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

                    # Use EndProductService to respect shop's archiving preference
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                    handle_completed_product_with_zero_inventory
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                  when "inactive"
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

                    # Set to draft but don't archive
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

                    set_product_status("DRAFT")
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                  else
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

                    # Just update inventory to 0 but keep active
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

                    update_shopify_inventory_only
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

                  end
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

                end
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

            
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                def handle_inventory_update
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

                  # Update both inventory and ensure product is active
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

                  success = update_shopify_inventory_only
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

            
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

                  if success && @product.status == "active"
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

                    # Ensure product is published if it was previously archived
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

                    set_product_status("ACTIVE")
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

                  end
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

            
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

                  success
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

                end
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            

            
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

                def handle_completed_product_with_zero_inventory
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Handling completed product with zero inventory: product_id=#{@shopify_product.shopify_product_id}"
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            

            
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            

                  # First set inventory to 0
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            

                  inventory_success = update_shopify_inventory_only
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            

            
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            

                  # Then archive or delete based on shop preference
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            

                  end_product_success = disable_product  # This calls EndProductService which respects shop settings
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            

            
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            

                  if end_product_success
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            

                    action = @shop.shopify_archive_products? ? "archived" : "deleted"
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Successfully #{action} Shopify product_id=#{@shopify_product.shopify_product_id} due to zero inventory"
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            

                  else
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            

                    action = @shop.shopify_archive_products? ? "archive" : "delete"
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Failed to #{action} Shopify product_id=#{@shopify_product.shopify_product_id}"
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            

                  end
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            

            
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            

                  inventory_success && end_product_success
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            

                end
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            

            
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            

                def archive_product_on_shopify
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Archiving Shopify product due to zero inventory"
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            

            
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            

                  # First set inventory to 0
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            

                  inventory_success = update_shopify_inventory_only
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            

            
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            

                  # Then archive the product
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            

                  archive_success = set_product_status("ARCHIVED")
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            

            
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            

                  if archive_success
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Successfully archived Shopify product_id=#{@shopify_product.shopify_product_id}"
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            

                  else
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Failed to archive Shopify product_id=#{@shopify_product.shopify_product_id}"
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            

                  end
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            

            

            
          
      346.

                def update_shopify_inventory_only
          
      350.

                  # Use the same logic as update_inventory_level but simplified
          
      351.

      355.

      356.

      364.

                    if response.body["errors"]

                def set_product_status(status)

                  begin

                def product_status_mutation
          
      437. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    437. 
            

            

                  <<~GQL
          
      438. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    438. 
            

            

                    mutation productUpdate($productId: ID!, $status: ProductStatus!) {
          
      439. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    439. 
            

            

                      productUpdate(
          
      440. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    440. 
            

            

                        input: {
          
      441. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    441. 
            

            

                          id: $productId
          
      442. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    442. 
            

            

                          status: $status
          
      443. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    443. 
            

            

                        }
          
      444. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    444. 
            

            

                      ) {
          
      445. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    445. 
            

            

                        product {
          
      446. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    446. 
            

            

                          id
          
      447. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    447. 
            

            

                          status
          
      448. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    448. 
            

            

                        }
          
      449. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    449. 
            

            

                        userErrors {
          
      450. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    450. 
            

            

                          field
          
      451. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    451. 
            

            

                          message
          
      452. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    452. 
            

            

                        }
          
      453. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    453. 
            

            

                      }
          
      454. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    454.

    455. 
            

            

                  GQL
          
      456. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    456.
