      457. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    457. 
            

            

            
          
      458. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    458. 
            

            

                def primary_location_id
          
      459. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    459. 
            

            

                  # You'll need to get the primary location ID for your shop
          
      460. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    460. 
            

            

                  # This is typically cached or stored in your shop configuration
          
      461. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    461. 
            

            

                  @shop.primary_location_id || fetch_primary_location_id
          
      462. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    462. 
            

            

                end
          
      463. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    463. 
            

            

            
          
      464. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    464. 
            

            

                def fetch_primary_location_id
          
      465. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    465. 
            

            

                  # Fetch the primary location from Shopify
          
      466. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    466. 
            

            

                  response = @client.query(
          
      467. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    467. 
            

            

                    query: locations_query
          
      468. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    468. 
            

            

                  )
          
      469. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    469. 
            

            

            
          
      470. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    470. 
            

            

                  locations = response.body["data"]["locations"]["edges"]
          
      471. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    471. 
            

            

                  primary_location = locations.find { |edge| edge["node"]["isPrimary"] }
          
      472. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    472. 
            

            

            
          
      473. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    473. 
            

            

                  if primary_location
          
      474. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    474. 
            

            

                    location_id = primary_location["node"]["id"].split("/").last
          
      475. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    475. 
            

            

                    # Cache this for future use
          
      476. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    476. 
            

            

                    @shop.update(primary_location_id: location_id) if @shop.respond_to?(:primary_location_id=)
          
      477. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    477. 
            

            

                    location_id
          
      478. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    478. 
            

            

                  else
          
      479. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    479. 
            

            

                    # Fallback to first location
          
      480. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    480. 
            

            

                    locations.first["node"]["id"].split("/").last if locations.any?
          
      481. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    481. 
            

            

                  end
          
      482. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    482. 
            

            

                end
          
      483. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    483. 
            

            

            
          
      484. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    484. 
            

            

                def locations_query
          
      485. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    485. 
            

            

                  <<~GQL
          
      486. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    486. 
            

            

                    query {
          
      487. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    487. 
            

            

                      locations(first: 10) {
          
      488. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    488. 
            

            

                        edges {
          
      489. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    489. 
            

            

                          node {
          
      490. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    490. 
            

            

                            id
          
      491. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    491. 
            

            

                            name
          
      492. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    492. 
            

            

                            isPrimary
          
      493. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    493. 
            

            

                          }
          
      494. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    494. 
            

            

                        }
          
      495. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    495. 
            

            

                      }
          
      496. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    496. 
            

            

                    }
          
      497. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    497. 
            

            

                  GQL
          
      498. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    498. 
            

            

                end
          
      499. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    499. 
            

            

              end
          
      500. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    500. 
            

            

            end
          
      501.

      63.

      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    shopify_product = @product.create_shopify_product!(
          
      65.

                      shop: @shop,
          
      66.

                def build_item_description

                def build_create_product_mutation

                def generate_image_url(image)

                def prepare_product_images

                  @product.images.map do |image|

                    resource_url = staged_upload_service.upload_image(image)
          
      161.

                    {
          
      162.

                      "contentType": "IMAGE",

                def escape_html(text)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  return "" unless text
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  text.gsub('"', '\"').gsub("\n", '\n').gsub("\r", "")
          
      172.

              end

    app/services/shopify/rate_limiter_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    128 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 128 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            module Shopify
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              class RateLimiterService
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                class RateLimitError < StandardError; end
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                # Shopify API limits
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                RATE_LIMIT_KEY = "shopify_api_rate_limit"
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                RATE_LIMIT_MAX = 1000 # Shopify default bucket size
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                RATE_LIMIT_RESTORE_RATE = 100 # Points restored per second
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                RATE_LIMIT_BUFFER = 50 # Safety buffer
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                MAX_WAIT_TIME = 30 # Maximum seconds to wait for points
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                MAX_RETRIES = 3 # Maximum number of Redis retries
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                DECREMENT_SCRIPT = <<~LUA
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  local key = KEYS[1]
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  local points_needed = tonumber(ARGV[1])
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  local current_points = tonumber(redis.call('get', key) or ARGV[2])
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  if current_points >= points_needed then
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    redis.call('decrby', key, points_needed)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    return 1
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  else
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    return 0
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                LUA
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                RESTORE_SCRIPT = <<~LUA
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  local key = KEYS[1]
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  local points_to_add = tonumber(ARGV[1])
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  local max_points = tonumber(ARGV[2])
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  local current_points = tonumber(redis.call('get', key) or max_points)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  local new_points = math.min(current_points + points_to_add, max_points)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  redis.call('set', key, new_points)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  return new_points
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                LUA
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                def initialize(shop_id)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  @shop_id = shop_id
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  @redis = Redis.new(
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    url: ENV.fetch("REDIS_URL", "redis://localhost:6379/0")
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  )
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  @key = "#{RATE_LIMIT_KEY}:#{@shop_id}"
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  # Load scripts once during initialization
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  load_lua_scripts
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                # Wait until enough points are available, then decrement the counter
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                def wait_for_points!(points_needed)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  total_points_needed = points_needed + RATE_LIMIT_BUFFER
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  start_time = Time.now
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  loop do
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                      # Try to atomically decrement points
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                      success = execute_script(:decrement, total_points_needed)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                      if success == 1
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                        break
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                      else
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                        # Check if we've waited too long
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                        raise RateLimitError, "Maximum wait time exceeded" if Time.now - start_time > MAX_WAIT_TIME
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                        # Calculate wait time based on current points and restoration rate
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                        current_points = current_points_available
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                        points_short = total_points_needed - current_points
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                        wait_time = [ (points_short.to_f / RATE_LIMIT_RESTORE_RATE).ceil, 1 ].max
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                        # Cap the wait time
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                        wait_time = [ wait_time, MAX_WAIT_TIME - (Time.now - start_time) ].min
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                        return false if wait_time <= 0
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                        sleep(wait_time)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                        restore_points(wait_time)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                      end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    rescue Redis::BaseError => e
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error("Redis error in rate limiter: #{e.message}")
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                      raise RateLimitError, "Redis error: #{e.message}"
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  true
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                end
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                # Update the counter based on Shopify's throttleStatus after each call
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                def update_from_throttle_status(throttle_status)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  return unless throttle_status
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

            
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  available = throttle_status["currentlyAvailable"].to_i
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  maximum = throttle_status["maximumAvailable"].to_i
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  if available > 0 && maximum > 0
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                    with_redis_retry do
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                      # Update both current and max if they've changed
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                      if maximum != RATE_LIMIT_MAX
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.warn("Shopify rate limit maximum has changed: #{maximum}")
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                      end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                      @redis.set(@key, available)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                    end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                rescue Redis::BaseError => e
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error("Failed to update throttle status: #{e.message}")
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                private
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

            
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                def current_points_available
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  with_redis_retry do
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                    points = @redis.get(@key)
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                    points ? points.to_i : RATE_LIMIT_MAX
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                def restore_points(seconds)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  points_to_restore = RATE_LIMIT_RESTORE_RATE * seconds
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  with_redis_retry do
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                    execute_script(:restore, points_to_restore)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

            
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                def load_lua_scripts
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  @script_shas = {}
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  with_redis_retry do
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                    @script_shas[:decrement] = @redis.script(:load, DECREMENT_SCRIPT)
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                    @script_shas[:restore] = @redis.script(:load, RESTORE_SCRIPT)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                rescue Redis::BaseError => e
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error("Failed to load Lua scripts: #{e.message}")
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  raise RateLimitError, "Failed to initialize rate limiter"
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                end
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                def execute_script(script_name, *args)
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  with_redis_retry do
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                    @redis.evalsha(@script_shas[script_name], keys: [ @key ], argv: args)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  end
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                rescue Redis::CommandError => e
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  if e.message.include?("NOSCRIPT")
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                    # Script was lost, reload and retry
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                    load_lua_scripts
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                    retry
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  else
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                    raise
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                def with_redis_retry
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  retries = 0
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                    yield
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  rescue Redis::BaseError => e
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                    retries += 1
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                    if retries <= MAX_RETRIES
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                      sleep(0.1 * retries) # Exponential backoff
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                      retry
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                    else
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                      raise
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

              end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

            end
          
      165.

    app/services/shopify/staged_upload_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    90 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 90 lines missed.

            require "net/http"

    2. 
            

            

            require "uri"
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            require "json"
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            require "tempfile"
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            require "net/http/post/multipart"
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            module Shopify
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              class StagedUploadService
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                # Connection timeout settings
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                CONNECT_TIMEOUT = 30  # seconds
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                READ_TIMEOUT = 60     # seconds
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                MAX_RETRIES = 3
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                def initialize(shop)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  @shop = shop
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  @client = ShopifyAPI::Clients::Graphql::Admin.new(session: @shop.shopify_session)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                def upload_image(image)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  retries = 0
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    file = image.download
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    filename = image.filename.to_s
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    mime_type = image.content_type
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    # Step 1: Get staged upload target
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    query = <<~GRAPHQL
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                      mutation stagedUploadsCreate($input: [StagedUploadInput!]!) {
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                        stagedUploadsCreate(input: $input) {
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                          stagedTargets {
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                            url
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                            resourceUrl
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                            parameters {
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                              name
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                              value
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                            }
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                          }
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                          userErrors {
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                            field
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                            message
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                          }
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                        }
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                      }
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    GRAPHQL
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    variables = {
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                      input: [
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                        {
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                          filename: filename,
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                          mimeType: mime_type,
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                          resource: "IMAGE",
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                          httpMethod: "POST",
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                          fileSize: file.size.to_s
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                        }
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                      ]
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    }
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    response = @client.query(query: query, variables: variables)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    target = response.body.dig("data", "stagedUploadsCreate", "stagedTargets")&.first
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    raise "Failed to get staged upload target: #{response.body}" unless target
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    # Step 2: Upload to S3
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    url = target["url"]
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    params = target["parameters"].map { |p| [ p["name"], p["value"] ] }.to_h
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    Tempfile.create(filename) do |tempfile|
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                      tempfile.binmode
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                      tempfile.write(file)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                      tempfile.rewind
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                      # Prepare multipart params
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                      multipart_params = params.transform_values { |v| v }
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                      multipart_params["file"] = UploadIO.new(tempfile, mime_type, filename)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                      uri = URI.parse(url)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                      request = Net::HTTP::Post::Multipart.new(uri, multipart_params)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                      http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                      http.use_ssl = true
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                      http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_PEER
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                      http.open_timeout = CONNECT_TIMEOUT
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                      http.read_timeout = READ_TIMEOUT
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                      http.ssl_timeout = CONNECT_TIMEOUT
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info "Uploading image #{filename} to #{uri.host}"
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                      upload_response = http.request(request)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                      unless upload_response.is_a?(Net::HTTPSuccess) || upload_response.code.to_i == 204
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                        raise "Failed to upload image to Shopify S3: #{upload_response.code} - #{upload_response.body}"
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                      end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                    # Step 3: Return the resourceUrl for use in product/media mutation
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                    target["resourceUrl"]
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                    retries += 1
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                    if retries <= MAX_RETRIES
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.warn "Error uploading image (attempt #{retries}/#{MAX_RETRIES}): #{e.message}. Retrying..."
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                      sleep(2 * retries) # Exponential backoff
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                      retry
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                    else
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "Failed to upload image after #{MAX_RETRIES} attempts: #{e.class} - #{e.message}"
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                      raise
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    end
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                end
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

              end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

            end
          
      110.
